Bake in preheated oven until cheese is hot and bubbly, for about 10-15 minutes.

name: Cucumber-Basil Simple Syrup
instructions: In a small saucepan combine the water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium high heat. Give the pan a quick stir to make sure the sugar has dissolved and remove from heat.
Add in sprigs of basil, lime juice, and cucumber. Let steep for 15 to 20 minutes, then pour through a strainer to remove all solids. Simple syrup may be stored for 2-3 weeks in the refrigerator.

name: Penne Pasta Salad with Spinach and Tomatoes

ingredients.name: sea salt
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 teaspoon sea salt (from McCormick® Sea Salt Grinder)

instructions: Cook pasta as directed on package. Drain well.

Meanwhile, mix oil, vinegar, rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, oregano and sea salt in large bowl with wire whisk until well blended. Add pasta and spinach; toss to coat well. Add tomatoes and cheeses; toss to mix well.
Serve warm or at room temperature.

name: Quarterback Quesadillas
instructions: In large bowl, stir together the pork, cheese, peppers, onion, cilantro, salt and pepper. Arrange one-eighth of the filling on each tortilla, covering half of it. Fold the tortilla over to make a half-moon. Place quesadillas, not touching, on shallow baking pans. Bake in a 500 degree F. oven until tortillas are crisp and golden; about 5 minutes. Transfer to large cutting board and cut into wedges to serve with salsa.

name: Couscous Cakes
instructions: Bring the stock to a boil in a medium saucepan over high heat. Add the couscous, almonds, currants, chives, lemon zest, salt, and pepper and stir well. Remove from heat and cover tightly for 10 minutes. Transfer to a medium bowl. Fluff couscous with a fork. Stir in yolks. Press couscous mixture into six 3-inch-wide cakes. Transfer to a plate and let stand 5 minutes.
Heat olive oil in a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Fry cakes, turning once, until golden, about 3 minutes per side. Transfer to paper towels to drain.
Serve with Moroccan-Inspired Country-Style Rib Ragu: https://www.yummly.com/recipe/Moroccan-Inspired-Country-Style-Rib-Ragu-with-Couscous-Cakes-2248355

name: Ham and Almond Pastry Ring

ingredients.name: chive and onion cream cheese spread
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup chive and onion cream cheese spread

instructions: In large bowl, blend cream cheese spread and dressing. Add ham, apple, grapes, onion and green pepper; gently stir until coated. Set aside.

Line a large baking sheet with heavy foil. Lightly coat with nonstick cooking spray. Unroll both cans of crescent rolls and separate. On prepared baking sheet arrange triangles overlapping with shortest side of each roll toward center leaving 5-inch circle open in center. Points of crescent dough may hang over edge of baking sheet. Press overlapping dough to flatten and close center circle to 4-inches.

Spoon mixture evenly over widest part of dough. Pull points of dough over filling and tuck dough under dough in center to form ring. (Some filling will be visible.) Brush dough evenly with beaten egg and sprinkle with almonds. Bake in preheated oven at 375 degrees F. for 25-30 minutes or until golden and pastry in inner circle is baked. (If necessary, loosely cover outer edge of pastry with foil during the last 10 minutes of baking to prevent over-browning.) Remove from oven and cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes. Using large spatula, carefully slide onto large serving platter.*
Makes 8 to 10 servings.
*If desired, use foil to lift and transfer pastry ring to serving platter. Cut foil in center of ring and underneath pastry ring; pull foil pieces to remove.

name: Banana and Lime Cake

ingredients.prep: if not available, use brown sugar
ingredients.name: grams muscovado sugar
ingredients.fullName: 180 grams muscovado sugar (if not available, use brown sugar)

instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit.
In a large bowl, mix the flour with the baking powder, salt and sugar.
Make a well in the center and pour the egg and cream cheese. Mix and add the mashed banana drizzled with the lime juice and half of the lemon zest.
Pour the mixture into a mold greased with a little butter.
Bake the cake for 40 to 45 minutes.
As soon as  the cake is cool, sprinkle it with the remaining zest and if you want with icing sugar .

name: Semi-sweet bread Rolls
instructions: In a bowl, add 330 grams of flour, 150 milliliters of water, and 75 grams of yeast. Mix all the ingredients together into a smooth paste. Set aside to double in size.
In another bowl;, add the remaining flour and water, plus the butter, shortening, sugar, and salt.
Add the yeast mixture and beat vigorously for 10 to 12 minutes until completely blended into a smooth dough.
Form into 2 balls, cover and leave to rise for up to 60 minutes.
Roll into a large sausage shape and cut into 14 pieces.
Roll each piece of dough into a small ball by hand on a work surface.
Place the balls, well spaced apart, on a baking sheet, and brush with beaten egg.
Allow to rise for 60 minutes until more than doubled in size.
Preheat the oven to 220 degrees Celsius.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden brown.

name: Pork and Olive Bruschetta

ingredients.prep: green, or black olive spread, also called olivada or tapenade*
ingredients.name: olive spread
ingredients.fullName: 1/3 cup olive spread (green, or black olive spread, also called olivada or tapenade*)

ingredients.prep: such as Pinot Grigio, for non-alcoholic, substitute chicken broth
ingredients.name: dry white wine
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup dry white wine (such as Pinot Grigio, for non-alcoholic, substitute chicken broth)

instructions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. Heat oil in a large ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat. Combine Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper in a small bowl. Rub all over pork. Add to skillet and cook, turning occasionally, until browned, about 5 minutes.

Leave pork in skillet and roast, turning occasionally, until an instant-read food thermometer inserted in center of pork reads 145 degrees F, 12 to 15 minutes. Let stand at room temperature for 3 to 5 minutes.
Heat skillet over medium-high heat. Add wine and bring to a boil, scraping up browned bits in pan with wooden spoon. Cook until reduced to about 2 tablespoons, about 5 minutes. Set aside.
Slice pork crosswise into 24 slices. For each bruschetta, place 1 pork slice on each toasted baguette slice. Top with about 1/2 teaspoon olive spread and drizzle with pan juices. Serve warm.

* If you desire to tie the tenderloin, cotton kitchen twine (also called butcher's twine) is handy to have on hand for a number of chores, especially tying tenderloin to help them keep their shape during cooking. If you don't have it, use unwaxed and unflavored dental floss.
*Roasted red pepper spread or sun-dried tomato pesto, in addition to or substituting for the olive spread, also work well in this recipe.
Makes 8 servings, 3 bruschetta each

name: Homemade Crisco Pie Crust Mix

ingredients.name: Pillsbury BEST All Purpose Flour
ingredients.fullName: 6 cups Pillsbury BEST All Purpose Flour

instructions: MIX flour and salt in large mixing bowl. Cut in shortening with pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Store in covered container. No refrigeration is needed
MEASURE amount of mix for pie crust into a bowl. Sprinkle water over mix, a tablespoon at a time. Toss lightly with a fork until mixture comes together to form a ball. Do not overmix.
USE to make crusts for your favorite pie recipes.
SINGLE CRUST PIE: 1 1/2 cups mix and 3 tablespoons water.
DOUBLE CRUST PIE: 2 1/4 cups mix and 4 to 5 tablespoons water.

name: Gluten-Free Garlic Toast
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Line a baking sheet with foil. Arrange bread slices on the baking sheet.
Spread softened butter evenly over both sides of bread slices, using a scant teaspoon on each side. Sprinkle both sides evenly with garlic powder and dried oregano.
Bake bread slices for 10 minutes on middle rack of oven.
Flip the bread slices and continue baking for 5-10 minutes, until toast slices are light golden-brown at the edges.
Check to see that toast is done. Remove from oven or add time as needed.
Serve immediately.

name: Mazola Heritage Sweet Salad Dressing circa 1950's
instructions: Combine sugar, vinegar, celery seed, paprika, salt and tomato sauce in a 1-quart jar and cover with lid. Shake to combine; add onion and oil. Continue to shake until mixed well. Let sit 30 minutes for sugar to dissolve and flavors to develop.
Store in tightly sealed jar in refrigerator for up to 1 month.

name: Onion-apple Glazed Pork Tenderloin

ingredients.name: envelope lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix
ingredients.fullName: 1 envelope lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix

instructions: Preheat oven to 425°. In small roasting or baking pan, arrange pork. Season with pepper and rub with 1 tablespoon Olive Oil. Roast uncovered 10 minutes.

Meanwhile, in small bowl, combine remaining Olive Oil, Lipton® Recipe Secrets® Onion Soup Mix, apple juice and brown sugar. Pour over pork and continue roasting 10 minutes or until pork is done. Remove pork to serving platter; cover with aluminum foil.

Place roasting pan over medium-high heat and bring pan juices to a boil, scraping up any brown bits from bottom of pan. Stir in water, wine and flour and boil, stirring constantly, 1 minute or until thickened. To serve, thinly slice pork and serve with gravy.

name: Crispy Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Prepare Crispy Chicken Strips according to package directions on a foil-lined baking pan.
Prepare pasta according to package directions.

While Chicken Strips and pasta are cooking, heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat and sauté garlic and onion for 5 minutes.  Add tomatoes and heat for an additional 5 minutes.  Stir in the cans of diced tomatoes and sauce and bring to a boil.  Boil for 5 minutes.  Reduce heat to low and stir in tomato paste, salt, pepper and basil and continue to heat for 10 minutes.

When Crispy Chicken Strips are cooked, remove from oven and leave on same baking pan.  Place 1 piece of mozzarella cheese on each Chicken Strip and cover with 1/4 cup of the basil tomato sauce.  Return to the oven and heat for 5 minutes or until cheese has melted.
Serve over prepared pasta.

name: Frisella with Tomato and Onion
instructions: Dissolve the dry yeast in the water.
Place the bran in a bowl with the cornstarch and the salt.
Add the yeast and the water and combine well until a thin batter forms.
Place the batter in two rectangular parchment paper-lined loaf pans and set them aside to rise for 2 hours.
Preheat the oven to 190 degrees Celsius.
Place the loaf pans in the oven and bake for 25 minutes.
Remove the friselle bread from the loaf pans and broil for 2 minutes to brown the tops.
Place the tomatoes and onions in a bowl with some torn basil leaves.
Add the bread, broken into pieces, and the yogurt (or oil), plus a pinch of salt and black pepper and a teaspoon of balsamic vinegar.
Set aside for approximately 15 minutes.
Serve chilled but not cold. Add diced tuna, grilled tofu, or turkey for added protein.

name: Chocolate and Orange Cream Jars and Adorable Easter Bunnies

ingredients.name: grams chocolate
ingredients.fullName: 75 grams chocolate (dessert chopped with a knife)

instructions: In a saucepan, in a water bath, or double boiler, add the cornstarch, sugar, and a pinch of salt, then stir. Add the milk, the liquid cream and the vanilla extract then thicken for around twenty minutes, stirring often.
When the cream has thickened considerably, add the chocolate, let it melt and continue cooking for 5 minutes.
Remove the pan from the double boiler. Pour a good tablespoon of orange jam into the bottom of the jars and cover with chocolate cream.
Cover with plastic film and store in the fridge for at least 1 hour before tasting.
In a bowl work the flour, the butter with your fingertips to sand them like a crumble batter. Make a well to put the sugar, salt and cream.

Always work with your fingertips and pick it up into a smooth ball. Let stand in a bowl covered with plastic film for 1 hour. On a floured surface, spread the dough with a roller to a thickness of 1/2 cm. Cut out shapes.
Brush them with an egg yolk diluted with a little milk. Place them on a baking sheet covered with parchment paper and cook for 10 minutes.
For the variant with hazelnuts, change the amount of flour to only 170 grams, and add 30 grams of ground hazelnuts.

name: Curried Apricot Chicken

ingredients.name: Smucker's Low Sugar Reduced Sugar Apricot Preserves
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup Smucker's Low Sugar Reduced Sugar Apricot Preserves

instructions: COAT a large skillet with no-stick coating spray; heat over medium-high heat. Cook chicken in hot skillet until golden brown on both sides, about 4 minutes. Remove from skillet.

HEAT oil over medium heat in same skillet. Add onion; cook 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in fruit, water, curry powder, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Return chicken to skillet. Cover and simmer 20 minutes or until internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F.
ARRANGE chicken breasts over rice on serving platter. Stir apricot preserves and parsley into sauce; heat through. Spoon sauce over chicken. Sprinkle with almonds.

name: Bertolli Baked Eggplant Parmigiana

ingredients.name: italian seasoned dry bread crumbs
ingredients.fullName: 1 3/4 cups italian seasoned dry bread crumbs

ingredients.prep: large, (about 2 lbs ), peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices
ingredients.name: ggplant
ingredients.fullName: 1 eggplant (large, (about 2 lbs ), peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices)

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°.

Combine bread crumbs with 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese in medium bowl. Dip eggplant in egg mixture, then bread crumb mixture, coating well. Arrange eggplant in single layer on lightly greased baking sheets. Bake 30 minutes or until golden.

Spread 1 cup Sauce in 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Layer 1/3 of the baked eggplant, then 1-1/2 cups Sauce, 1/3 of the mozzarella cheese and 1/3 of the remaining Parmesan cheese; repeat. Top with remaining eggplant and Sauce.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake 45 minutes. Remove foil and top with remaining cheeses. Bake uncovered an additional 10 minutes or until cheese is melted.

name: Hummus and Mutabel
instructions: Hummus preparation: put all the ingredients, except the oil and paprika which are used as garnish at the end, in a food processor and grind. If it is too thick, add a little liquid from the chickpeas or water.
Season with garlic and cumin according to taste. Transfer to a bowl. At serving time, sprinkle with paprika and add extra virgin olive oil to taste.
Mutabel preparation: repeat the process above.
Put all ingredients in the food processor, including a stream of extra virgin olive oil. Grind well and adjust the amount of garlic and cumin according to taste.
Serving suggestion: pita bread, slices of toast, carrot sticks, mid lettuce leaves.

name: Fall Apple Slaw

ingredients.prep: OR 6 to 7 cups shredded cabbage with carrots
ingredients.name: nces coleslaw mix
ingredients.fullName: 16 ounces coleslaw mix (OR 6 to 7 cups shredded cabbage with carrots)

instructions: Blend together cole slaw dressing, apple cider vinegar and celery seed. In large bowl, stir together cole slaw mix and diced apple. Pour dressing over and toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate until serving.
Serves 4 to 6.
For a twist on traditional harvest slaw, omit apple cider vinegar and celery seed and replace with 2 teaspoons peanut butter and 1/4 teaspoon chili oil. Prepare as directed above.

name: Cheese and Vegetable Sandwich
instructions: Mix the zucchini, carrot, cheddar, onion, and salsa together in a bowl.  Salt and pepper slightly.
Prepare the sandwiches by placing half the vegetable mixture on a slice of bread, covering with the other slice of bread, and placing onto a skillet previously spritzed with the cooking spray.
Place a heavy object, such as a pan or plate weighed down with cans, on top of the sandwich to press.  Cook for 2 minutes, flip, and cook for 2 minutes more.
Remove from the skillet, cut the sandwich in half, and serve.

name: Grilled Salmon Over Greens With Cilantro-lime Dressing

ingredients.name: hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise

instructions:
1. In medium bowl, combine Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise, onion, cilantro and lime juice; reserve 1/2 cup for dressing.
 
2. Grill or broil salmon, turning once and brushing with remaining mayonnaise mixture, until salmon flakes with a fork.
 
3. Stir tomato into reserved 1/2 cup dressing. To serve, arrange salmon over lettuce and serve with dressing.

name: Dutch Oven Chicken and Dumplings

ingredients.prep: rotisserie, meat taken off and pulled into pieces, or turkey
ingredients.name: chickens
ingredients.fullName: 2 chickens (rotisserie, meat taken off and pulled into pieces, or turkey)

ingredients.prep: depending on how much spice you’d like
ingredients.name: cayenne
ingredients.fullName: 3 teaspoons cayenne (depending on how much spice you’d like)

ingredients.name: chicken broth
ingredients.fullName: 5 cups chicken broth (or veggie with turkey)

ingredients.prep: I added this to the directions
ingredients.name: butter
ingredients.fullName: 1 tablespoon butter (I added this to the directions)

instructions: If camping: Heat 20 briquettes in campfire and remove 14, leaving the other 6 in the fire, place them on the side away from the fire. Place dutch oven (lid on and pre-seasoned) over those 14 to begin heating. Add canola oil after 30 minutes or so, then butter. When you see bubbles, add onion, celery, carrot, shallot, salt/pepper, herbs of choice and cayenne. When they begin to soften, add a small amount of broth, mix and place the lid on top for 10-15 minutes or until veggies are soft. Add the chicken and enough chicken broth to cover. I added more briquettes to the bottom and a few on the lid at this point to really heat things up. Allow this to reduce a bit and heat the chicken, then you might need to add some flour to thicken, stirring it in the entire time. Make dumplings in a bowl until you have a chunky mix and plop them over the chicken mix, 6 to 8 dumplings. Place lid back on and cook 10-15 minutes or until the dough is cooked through. Ta-da!

Not camping: Heat dutch oven over medium heat and add oil, a few minutes later add veggies, butter, herbs, cayenne and salt/pepper. Cook until veggies are soft, then add some broth and reduce 5 or so minutes. Toss in the chicken pieces and more broth, just to cover the chicken and place lid on for about 5-10 minutes. Stir in flour to thicken and make dumpling mix. Plop the dumplings, 6 to 8 on the mix and cover again for 15-20 minutes or until the dough is cooked through.

name: Holiday Breakfast Casserole

ingredients.name: breakfast sausage links
ingredients.fullName: 2 packages breakfast sausage links (12 ounces each JOHNSONVILLE® Original)

instructions: Cook sausage according to package directions. Cool slightly; cut ¼-inch coin-sized pieces.
In a greased 9 x 13-inch baking dish, layer half English muffin cubes and half cooked sausage; repeat layers.
Drizzle with butter and top with the cheese, onion and red pepper.
In a large bowl, combine the eggs, milk, salt and pepper; pour over casserole. Sprinkle with bacon; cover and refrigerate overnight.
Remove from refrigerator 30 minutes before baking. Uncover and bake at 350˚F for 45 to 50 minutes, or until a knife inserted into the center comes out clean; let stand 5 minutes.

name: Potato Waffles and smoked salmon
instructions: Cook potatoes in boiling water and puree them without adding milk. Let cool.
In a bowl, combine flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, eggs, potato puree, chives, grated cheese, and melted butter.
Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly.
Let the dough rest for 2 hours.
Heat a waffle iron and cook waffles until well browned.
To serve, place a small piece of smoked salmon on each waffle, garnish with cream, pepper and lemon zest.

name: Iberian Pig, Camembert Cheese, and Red Bell Pepper Sauce Tapas
instructions: Preheat the oven to 170 degrees Celsius.
Coat the bell pepper with oil and season with salt. Add to a baking dish and roast for 1 hour. Turn every 15 minutes.
Remove the bell pepper from the oven and place in a resealable plastic bag. After 20 minutes, peel and seed the bell pepper.
Place the bell pepper flesh in the blender along with its juices and the sugar. Puree until smooth.
In a skillet, add a tablespoon of oil. Pan-sear the steaks for 5 minutes on each side.
Toast the slices of bread and add the Camembert cheese slices on top.
Once the steaks are done, place them top of the cheese so it will melt. Plate with some roasted pepper sauce on the steaks.

name: Tuscan Pork Roast in Milk Sauce

ingredients.name: pork roast
ingredients.fullName: 3 pounds pork roast (boneless blade, netted or tied)

instructions: Melt butter with oil in large skillet over medium high heat. Add roast and brown on all sides, about 10 minutes. Transfer to 3 1/2-quart slow cooker with salt and pepper. To skillet, add onion and garlic and cook, stirring, 5 minutes, until softened. Add 1/2 cup milk, rosemary and bay leaf to skillet; bring to simmer, stirring constantly, scraping up brown bits from bottom of skillet. Transfer to slow cooker with 1 1/2 cups remaining milk. Cover and slow-cook on low 5-6 hours. Transfer pork to platter and keep warm. Discard bay leaf, skim fat from surface of cooking liquid. In medium saucepan bring cooking liquid to boil over medium heat. Cook, stirring often, until sauce is reduced to 1 cup.
Slice or chop roast, serve with sauce.

name: Pineapple Upside Down Cake
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Cover a bundt cake mold with a light layer of butter or cooking spray and flour.
Place 4 to 6 slices of pineapple at the bottom of the mold.
Pour 1 cup of sugar into a pan and caramelize the sugar by heating it up on low heat until it becomes dark and somewhat liquefied. Add the caramelized sugar into the cake mold onto the pineapples.
Melt the butter in a small pot, and then add the remaining sugar into the pot and mix well. Add the melted butter to a bowl and allow to cool slightly.
Add the eggs and mix well.
Add the milk, flour, baking powder and pineapple syrup and mix everything well.
Pour the mixture into the bundt cake mold.
Place the mold in the oven and bake for 45 minutes.

name: Chocolate Chiffon Cake with Chocolate Mocha Glaze

ingredients.name: unsalted butter
ingredients.fullName: 6 tablespoons unsalted butter (6 Tbsp. = 85 g, melted & divided)

ingredients.name: eggs
ingredients.fullName: 6 large eggs (6 eggs = about 300 g, room temperature)

ingredients.name: pure vanilla extract
ingredients.fullName: 1 1/2 tablespoons pure vanilla extract (1 1/2 Tbsp. = 9.4 g)

ingredients.name: all purpose flour
ingredients.fullName: 1 1/2 cups all purpose flour (1 1/2 cups = 180 g)

ingredients.name: Dutch process cocoa powder
ingredients.fullName: 1/3 cup Dutch process cocoa powder (1/3 cup = 32 g)

ingredients.name: fine sea salt
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 teaspoon fine sea salt (1/2 tsp. = 2.3 g)

ingredients.name: bittersweet chocolate
ingredients.fullName: 1 cup bittersweet chocolate (1 cup = 6 oz = 168 g, finely chopped)

ingredients.name: heavy whipping cream
ingredients.fullName: 6 tablespoons heavy whipping cream (6 Tbsp. = 90 mL)

ingredients.name: light corn syrup
ingredients.fullName: 1 tablespoon light corn syrup (1 Tbsp. = 15 mL)

ingredients.name: instant espresso powder
ingredients.fullName: 3/4 teaspoon instant espresso powder (3/4 tsp. = 0.84 g)

ingredients.name: fine sea salt
ingredients.fullName: 1/4 teaspoon fine sea salt (1/4 tsp. = 1.5 g)

instructions: Position an oven rack in the center of the oven and preheat the oven to 325ºF/160ºC/gas 3. Generously butter a 9.5-in/26-cm two-piece angel food cake pan with 1 1/2 tablespoons of the melted butter. Set aside.
Combine the remaining 4 1/2 tablespoons of butter with 3 tablespoons of hot water in a glass measuring cup. Keep warm.

Place the eggs in the bowl of your KitchenAid® Stand Mixer fitted with the wire whip. Attach the KitchenAid® Sifter + Scale Attachment to your mixer. Close the ingredient valve. Weigh the sugar in the ingredient hopper. Turn the mixer to high speed and whip the eggs for 1 minute. Open the ingredient valve, and sift the sugar into the mixing bowl. Beat the eggs and sugar until the mixture turns thick and pale yellow, and the mixture falls in ribbons from the whip, about 8 to 10 minutes. About 5 minutes into the mixing time, slowly pour the vanilla down the side of the bowl.

Meanwhile, close the ingredient valve and weigh the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt in the ingredient hopper, taring the scale between ingredients. Once the eggs have reached the ribbon stage, turn the mixer to low speed, open the ingredient valve, and sift in the flour mixture. Be careful not to overmix the batter. Remove the mixer bowl, and use a rubber spatula to blend in any flour remaining on the sides of the bowl. Using a rubber spatula, fold in the melted butter mixture, just until combined.

Gently pour the batter into the prepared tube pan. Bake the cake until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 40 to 45 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack and let the cake cool in the pan. Once the cake is completely cool, run a table knife around the edges of the pan to loosen the cake, including the inner tube. Carefully lift up the tube to release the cake from the sides of the pan. Run a table knife around the bottom to release the cake. Lift the cake straight up, off the tube, and transfer the cake to a wire rack set over a baking sheet.

While the cake is cooling, prepare the glaze. In a medium metal or heatproof bowl, combine the chocolate, cream, corn syrup, espresso powder, and salt. Place the bowl over a pan of barely simmering water and heat, stirring frequently, until the chocolate mixture is smooth and shiny. Remove from the heat.

To glaze the cake, evenly pour the glaze over the cake and then use a small offset spatula to spread the glaze evenly over the top of the cake, spreading it out to the edges. Use all of the glaze. Lift the cake still on the wire rack and tap the wire rack down on the baking sheet several times, allowing the glaze to naturally flow down the sides of the cake. Set aside for 30 minutes to allow the glaze to set. Transfer the cake to a cake plate, cut into wedges and serve. The cake is best when served on the day it is baked. Store the cake for up to 2 days in a covered cake box at room temperature.

name: Mushroom and Saffron Soup
instructions: Wash the mushrooms and cut into pieces.
Peel and dice both the onion and potatoes.
Soak some strands of saffron in water for 20 minutes.
In a large saucepan, melt the butter, add the onion and potatoes and gently brown.
Add the mushrooms and cook for a few minutes.
Add the stock, milk, and salt to taste, cover and bring to the boil on medium heat.
Remove from the heat and add to a blender. Puree until smooth.
Return to the heat for a few minutes, add the saffron and mix.
Serve with a sprinkling of sage.

name: Grilled Pacific Pork Fajitas
instructions: Butterfly tenderloins—cutting horizontally almost but not quite enough; place in a large self-sealing bag; pour marinade over, seal bag and refrigerate 4-24 hours, turning occasionally.

Prepare medium-hot fire in kettle-style grill. Remove tenderloins from marinade and place directly over medium hot coals, discarding remaining marinade. Grill covered for about 6-7 minutes on each side (about 20 minutes total) until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees F. Remove to cutting board and let rest for 5 minutes.  Then slice meat thinly across the grain. Serve meat on large serving platter, surrounded by grilled vegetables. Pass basket of warmed tortillas. Serve with Ginger-Peach Salsa.

name: Creamy Shrimp Salad

ingredients.name: Best Foods Mayonnaise
ingredients.fullName: 1/3 cup Best Foods Mayonnaise (or Hellmann's®, with Lime Juice)

ingredients.name: uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
ingredients.fullName: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

ingredients.prep: cubed, or 1 can, 8 oz. pineapple chunks, drained
ingredients.name: fresh pineapple
ingredients.fullName: 1 cup fresh pineapple (cubed, or 1 can, 8 oz. pineapple chunks, drained)

instructions: Combine Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Mayonnaise with Lime Juice, Mexican crema, jalapeno, garlic, cilantro and lime juice in large bowl; set aside.
Heat olive oil in 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat cook shrimp and salt, turning once, 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Let cool. Toss shrimp and pineapple with mayonnaise mixture.

name: Roasted Tomato Chicken & Chipotle Soup

ingredients.name: chickpeas
ingredients.fullName: 16 ounces chickpeas (or garbanzos, rinsed and drained)

ingredients.name: knorr reduc sodium chicken flavor bouillon cube
ingredients.fullName: 2 knorr reduc sodium chicken flavor bouillon cube

instructions:
Roast tomatoes in a dry skillet over medium-high heat until well blackened, turning often.  Remove skins, if desired, and puree in a blender or food processor until smooth.
 
Heat olive oil in a large saucepot over medium heat and cook garlic and onion about 3 minutes or until softened, stirring occasionally.  Add tomatoes and chipotle pepper and   bring to a boil.  Reduce heat and simmer about 8 minutes until soup thickens slightly.  Stir in chicken and next 3 ingredients.  Simmer about 25 minutes, stirring occasionally.  Garnish with sour cream, chopped green onions and chopped fresh cilantro.

name: Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Nut Cookies

ingredients.prep: OR 3/4 stick Crisco® Baking Sticks Butter Flavor All-Vegetable Shortening
ingredients.name: Crisco Butter Flavor All-Vegetable Shortening
ingredients.fullName: 3/4 cup Crisco Butter Flavor All-Vegetable Shortening (OR 3/4 stick Crisco® Baking Sticks Butter Flavor All-Vegetable Shortening)

ingredients.name: White Lily Enriched Bleached All-Purpose Flour
ingredients.fullName: 1 cup White Lily Enriched Bleached All-Purpose Flour

instructions: HEAT oven to 375°F. Coat baking sheets with no-stick cooking spray.
BEAT shortening, brown sugar, egg, milk and vanilla in large bowl at medium speed of electric mixer until well blended.

COMBINE flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon in small bowl. Beat into shortening mixture at low speed until smooth. Stir in oats, raisins and nuts. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets.
BAKE 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool 2 minutes on baking sheet. Remove to wire rack to cool.

name: Madeleines with Candied Orange
instructions: Cut the orange peel into small pieces. Set aside.
Mix the flour, yeast, almonds, and orange peel.
Add the eggs, sugar, and melted butter.
Mix and put in the refrigerator for at least one hour.
Preheat oven to 270C.
Fill the madeleine molds to 2/3.
Bake for 4 minutes, lower the heat to 210C, and continue baking for about 6 minutes until the madeleines are golden.

name: Cinnamon Bread

ingredients.name: Duncan Hines Classic Yellow Cake Mix
ingredients.fullName: 1 package Duncan Hines Classic Yellow Cake Mix

instructions: Pour cake mix into a large mixing bowl. Remove 3 Tbsp from the mix and discard.
Add oil, water, eggs, and vanilla. Beat until completely smooth.
Grease each loaf pan and fill half way with batter.
In a separate bowl, mix the sugar and cinnamon together.
Sprinkle ⅓ cup of the cinnamon sugar mixture on to the half filled loaf pans.
Add remaining batter to each loaf pan. Be mindful that the mix will rise.
Sprinkle the remaining cinnamon sugar mixture on top of each loaf.
Using a butter knife, gently move the batter around creating cinnamon swirls.
Bake at 350°F for 45 to 50 minutes.

name: Rye Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180C.
Combine the three types of flour with the sugar and a pinch of baking soda or baking powder.
Gradually add, by alternating them, the oil and the wine while kneading. If necessary, add more flour to the dough.
Place some granulated sugar in a bowl.
Cut the dough into pieces and shape each piece into a link, then bring the two ends of the link together, squeeze to seal the ends closed.
Dip only one side of each cookie into the bowl with the sugar to coat it.
Place each cookie on a wax paper lined baking sheet, sugar-side up.
Bake the cookies for 15 to 20 minutes.
Remove the cookies from the oven and cool on a wire rack.

name: Tiramisu
instructions: In a bowl, mix together the egg yolks with half the sugar.
Once mixed, add the mascarpone cheese and beat well until there are no lumps.
In another bowl, add the egg whites and whisk until stiff peaks, then add the rest of the sugar.
Fold the 1st mixture into the 2nd mixture slowly so as not to lose volume.
One by one, soak the ladyfingers for 3 seconds each in the coffee and make a layer of them in the bottom of a baking dish.
Cover the ladyfingers with a layer of cream, and smooth out with a spatula. Sift cocoa powder onto the cream.
Repeat all 3 layers one more time.

name: Tuna and Caper Breadsticks
instructions: In a bowl, add the flour. Make a well in the flour and add the water, yeast, salt, barley, tuna pate, caper pate, and 25 grams of oil. Mix well for 8 to 10 minutes. Add a little flour if the dough appears too soft.
Form into a baguette shape, and roll into a rectangle. Brush the dough with olive oil.
Cover and leave to rise for 1 hour.
Preheat the oven to 190 degrees Celsius.
With a sharp knife, cut out long strips of dough about an inch thick from the short side of the rectangle.
Roll out the dough by hand into a thin bread stick shape.
Arrange onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, leaving a space between each stick.
Bake for 15 minutes.

name: Pumpkin Coffee Cake

ingredients.prep: cold diced, plus 115 grams softened butter
ingredients.name: grams butter
ingredients.fullName: 85 grams butter (cold diced, plus 115 grams softened butter)

instructions: Preheat oven to 160 degrees Celsius.
Prepare the streusel by pouring 60 grams of flour, 80 grams of brown sugar, 85 grams of cold, diced butter, crushed pecans, and 1 teaspoon of cinnamon in a bowl. Mix with your fingertips.
Set aside in the refrigerator.

For the squash puree, wash the butternut squash, cut it into thick slices, and remove the seeds. Place the slices in an ovenproof plate. Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons of olive oil (no salt nor sugar) and bake at 200 C for 50 minutes to 1 hour, until very tender. Purée and keep in a jar in a cool place.
In a large bowl, mix 220 grams of flour, baking powder, baking soda, a pinch of salt, and spices.
In another bowl, mix 115 grams of softened butter and 130 grams of brown sugar until well blended and smooth. Add to the mixture of dry ingredients and stir.
Add the eggs gradually, then the squash puree, the cream, and the cranberries. You should obtain a smooth batter.
Pour into a 26 centimeter diameter baking dish lined with parchment paper.
Remove the streusel from the refrigerator. Mix it quickly to slightly reduce the size of the pecans.
Spread the streusel on the top of the cake, pressing lightly.
Bake for 50 minutes, checking the doneness with the blade of a knife.
Let it cool down and sprinkle with powdered sugar.

name: Stuffed Chayote Squash

ingredients.name: soft cheese
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup soft cheese (such as cottage cheese)

ingredients.prep: shredded, such as mozzarella cheese or cheddar cheese
ingredients.name: cheese
ingredients.fullName: cheese (shredded, such as mozzarella cheese or cheddar cheese)

instructions: Place the squash in a pot of salted water on medium heat and cook for up to 1 hour.
Drain the squash and add them to cold water until they soften.
Cut the squash in half  and remove the seeds and pulp from the flesh. Set the pulp aside.
Chop up the pulp and then place it into a strainer so that the liquid drains away.
Place the squash flesh onto a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess liquid.
Add the oil to a frying pan on medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and saute until softened, about 5 minutes.
Once sauteed, add the eggs to the pan and mix well.
Add the pulp into the pan and cook for 2 minutes or until the liquids evaporate.
Add salt and pepper, stir, and turn off the heat. Add the cheese and mix well.
Preheat oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Lightly oil a glass baking dish. Fill up the squash halves with the mixture and place in the dish.
Top each squash half with the remaining cheese and top with a dollop of sour cream on top.
Place the baking dish into the oven and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove from the oven and serve warm.

name: Strata
instructions: Cut the slices of bread into circle, place the portions of bread that are left on at the bottom of a casserole dish.
Add a layer of cheese, artichokes, and then add the chopped tomatoes and salami slices on top.
Put the bread circles on top of the cheese and place a bit of tomato on each bread.
On a separate bowl, add the egg, milk, oregano and a pinch of salt and beat all of the ingredients together. Pour the mixture into the casserole dish, soaking everything well.
Top everything off with shredded cotija or Parmesan cheese. cover the dish with plastic wrap and place it in the refrigerator for 4 to 5 hours.
Preheat the oven to 170 degrees Celsius.
Remove the plastic wrap, place the dish in the oven and bake for 30 minutes.
Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for 10 minutes. Serve warm.

name: Pork Tenderloin en Croute
instructions: For marinade, in a heavy self-sealing plastic bag, combine wine, tarragon, and garlic. Place tenderloin in bag; seal securely. Turn bag to distribute marinade. Place in a shallow baking dish. Marinate in refrigerator 4 to 6 hours, turning occasionally.

Remove tenderloin, reserving marinade. Pat tenderloin dry with paper towels. Melt butter in a large heavy skillet. Add tenderloin and brown on all sides. Add marinade; cover and simmer 10 minutes. Remove tenderloin, transferring marinade to glass measuring cup. Place tenderloin in shallow baking dish and place in freezer for 30 minutes.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 425 degrees F. In a mixing bowl, stir together flour and salt. Cut in shortening with a pastry blender till crumbs are the size of peas. In a small bowl, beat together egg yolk and 3 tablespoons of the cold water. Add the egg yolk mixture to the flour mixture, a little at a time, mixing with a fork after each addition. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons more cold water to the flour mixture, 1 tablespoon at a time, mixing with a fork till dough clings together. Form dough into a ball. Flatten dough; place between 2 sheets of waxed paper. Roll to a 1/8-inch-thick rectangle. Remove top sheet of waxed paper. Trim to a rectangle about 2 inches longer and 6 inches wider than tenderloin. Remove tenderloin from freezer and pat dry with paper towels. Place on pastry. Trim edges and of pastry. Fold in ends of pastry. Using the bottom sheet of waxed paper to guide pastry, wrap pastry around tenderloin, trimming to leave about 1/2-inch overlap. Seal edges with cold water.

Line a baking sheet with foil; spray with nonstick coating. Transfer pastry-wrapped tenderloin to baking sheet. In a small bowl, beat together egg white and the 1 tablespoon water until foamy. Brush pastry with egg white mixture. Bake in preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or till golden brown and until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees Fahrenheit, followed by a 3-minute rest time.  Remove pastry-wrapped tenderloin from oven; let stand 5 minutes.

Meanwhile for sauce, measure the reserved marinade and add cold water to equal 1 cup. Transfer to a small saucepan. Stir in cornstarch, mixing well. Cook and stir over medium heat till slightly thickened and bubbly.
To serve, slice tenderloin with sharp bread knife. Serve with sauce.

name: Soft Cake
instructions: Mix oat bran.
Preheat oven to 180°C (356°F).
In a bowl, combine yolks, sweetener, petit suisse, mixed oat bran and the chosen flavor.
Let it rest for a few minutes, until the oat mixture sets.
Meanwhile, beat the egg whites and add them gradually.
Pour the batter into the silicone cake mold and bake in the middle rack for around 20 to 30 minutes.

name: Sous Vide Filet Mignon with Green Peppercorn Pan Sauce

ingredients.name: filet mignon steaks
ingredients.fullName: 2 filet mignon steaks (cut 1 1/2-2 inches thick, 10 oz. each)

name: Margaret's Sausage Egg Rolls

ingredients.name: Jimmy Dean® Premium Pork Regular Sausage
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 package Jimmy Dean® Premium Pork Regular Sausage

ingredients.name: ups prepared rice sticks
ingredients.fullName: 2 cups prepared rice sticks (or noodles, cut into 1-inch pieces)

instructions: Cook sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8-10 minutes or until sausage is thoroughly cooked, stirring frequently; drain. Add coleslaw blend, ginger, garlic, pepper and salt; mix well. Cool slightly.

Beat egg white and cornstarch in small bowl with wire whisk until well blended. Spoon 1/3 cup sausage mixture onto center of each egg roll wrapper; brush edges of wrapper lightly with egg wash. Fold in opposite sides of each wrapper, then roll up tightly.
Heat 2 inches oil in large deep skillet or deep fryer on medium-high heat to 375°F.
Add egg rolls in batches; cook 3-4 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. Serve with desired dipping sauce.
This recipe was created in partnership with Jimmy Dean brand for the Family Table program.

name: Brain Dead Dip

ingredients.name: Hellmann's or Best Foods Real Mayonnaise
ingredients.fullName: 1 cup Hellmann's or Best Foods Real Mayonnaise

instructions: Slice off top of cauliflower to create flat surface. Turn over and remove core to create bowl, reserving any florets; set aside. Blanch, if desired.
In medium bowl, combine Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise, cheeses, olives, onion, garlic and oregano; set aside.

On serving platter, arrange cauliflower; spoon in dip. Arrange reserved florets around dip to create brain". In small resealable plastic bag, add ketchup; close. Cut one corner of bag and pipe "blood" on brain. Serve with your favorite dippers."

name: Yellow Curry Paste

ingredients.name: shrimp paste
ingredients.fullName: 1 teaspoon shrimp paste (found at Asian grocery stores)

instructions: In a small pan without any fat toast coriander, cumin and cinnamon until  fragrant (1 to 2 minutes)
Put the toasted spices and all the remaining ingredients(except the oil) in a mortar and mash them to get a smooth paste. Add the oil and mix.
Store in the refrigerator or freeze it in small portions.

name: Bagels with Earl Grey Tea Seeds in Bread Machine
instructions: In the bread machine, combine the milk and cream. Set aside, then combine with the flour, salt, butter and egg.
Select the dough setting. When it beeps, add the rest of the ingredients (and the contents of the Earl Grey tea bag).
Once the bread machine has completed its cycle, remove the dough, roll into balls, and and brush with egg and sprinkle with sesame seeds to taste.
Bake for 30 minutes, or until it is cooked and golden.

name: Honey Apricots with  "Financier" Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit.
Melt the butter in a small saucepan and bring it to a hazelnut color, let cool.

In a bowl, whisk the eggs with the sugar, then add the cooled butter and almond powder. Finally, add the flour and a pinch of salt. Pour the custard into "financiers" molds (previously buttered if they're not silicone molds). Bake for about fifteen minutes. Wait for the "financiers" to cool to unmold.

Separate the apricots in half before serving. In a pan, melt the honey over medium heat. Add the apricot halves, fry them while stirring constantly in order to coat them with honey. Cooking should be fast, only 1 to 2 minutes.
Serve each "financier" cookie with three apricot halves in honey.

name: Festive Holiday Pinwheels

ingredients.name: pork loin roast
ingredients.fullName: 4 ounces pork loin roast (sliced very thin)

ingredients.name: red bell pepper
ingredients.fullName: 1 red bell pepper (seeded and cut in half)

ingredients.prep: 10-inch, red or green or two of each
ingredients.name: flour tortillas
ingredients.fullName: 4 flour tortillas (10-inch, red or green or two of each)

instructions: Cut broccoli, bell pepper and onions into coarse chunks. Pulse vegetables in food processor until coarsely chopped, remove and reserve. Cut cream cheese into chunks and whirl in food processor with horseradish, lemon juice and blue cheese. Return vegetables to processor and pulse just until ingredients are mixed, not pureed.

Spread one side of each tortilla with 1/2 cup cheese mixture to the edge. Layer tortillas with equal portions of pork, sprinkle evenly with parsley and almonds. Roll tortilla snugly; set seam side down. (If making up to one day ahead, wrap airtight in plastic wrap and refrigerate). Cut each roll crosswise into six equal pieces and arrange on a platter.

name: New Mexican Back Ribs
instructions: In small bowl, stir together all seasoning ingredienta. Rub ribs on all surfaces with seasoning rub. Place ribs on a medium-hot grill over indirect heat; close grill hood and grill until ribs are tender, about 1 1/2 to 2 hours. (add more charcoal briquettes to fire, if necessary, to maintain grill temperature of about 325-350 degrees F.)

name: Chocolate Ring Cake
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Crush the hazelnuts using a food processor.
In a bowl, beat the eggs with the sugar and a pinch of salt until light and frothy.
Sieve the flours, baking powder, and cocoa powder.
Add the dry ingredients to the egg mixture, a little at a time, alternating with the oil.
Pour into a greased and floured 24-centimeter ring mold, and coat with the hazelnuts.
Place the pan in the oven and bake for 40 to 45 minutes.

name: Ricciarelli Cookies

ingredients.prep: or a pinch of baking soda
ingredients.name: baking powder
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 teaspoon baking powder (or a pinch of baking soda)

instructions: Preheat the oven to 160C.
Combine the sugar with the almond flour, vanilla extract, baking powder, and a few drops of almond extract, add the egg whites a little at a time.
Place the dough onto the work surface floured with some powdered sugar.
Shape the dough into links and then cut into small rhombus shapes.
Coat the cookies completely in powdered sugar.
Line a baking sheet with wax paper and place the ricciarelli cookies leaving some space between each one.
Bake for no more than 10 minutes (the cookies need to dry but not overcook), leaving the oven door slightly ajar for the steam to be released.
Remove the cookies from the oven and let them rest for a few hours before serving.

name: Apple and Coconut Braid
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F).
Peel apple and cut into thin slices.
Heat apple slices, sugar, cinnamon and butter in a saucepan until apples are al dente.
Remove from heat and set aside to cool.
Reserve syup from cooked apples.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Roll out the puff pastry sheet on baking sheet.
Sprinkle grated coconut and apple slices over the middle third of pastry sheet.
Cut the sides of pastry into horizontal strips and place in a crisscross pattern over the filling by alternating strips from each side.
Brush the pastry with some of the reserved syrup from cooked apples.
Bake in preheated oven on the middle rack until lightly browned for about 20 minutes.
Cool on a wire rack.

name: Decadent Strawberry Brownie Tart

ingredients.name: Pillsbury™ Chocolatier Collection™ Caramel Swirl Premium Brownie Mix
ingredients.fullName: 15.9 ounces Pillsbury™ Chocolatier Collection™ Caramel Swirl Premium Brownie Mix

ingredients.name: Smucker's® Orchard's Finest® Pacific Mountain Strawberry Preserves
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup Smucker's® Orchard's Finest® Pacific Mountain Strawberry Preserves

ingredients.prep: sliced fresh, about one 16 oz. container
ingredients.name: strawberries
ingredients.fullName: 3 cups strawberries (sliced fresh, about one 16 oz. container)

ingredients.name: white baking chips
ingredients.fullName: 1/3 cup white baking chips (or semi-sweet chocolate chips)

instructions: HEAT oven to 350°F. Coat 9-inch pie plate with no-stick cooking spray. Prepare brownie batter according to package directions using packet of chocolate flavored syrup, 1/3 cup oil, water and egg. Spread in prepared pie plate. Bake 33 to 36 minutes or until center is set. Cool completely on wire rack. Spread 1/4 cup preserves evenly over brownie.

BEAT cream and powdered sugar in medium bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until stiff. Spread evenly over preserves on brownie layer. Beginning near outside edge, arrange strawberry slices on top of whipped cream, in 5 to 6 overlapping concentric circles, with bottom ends of strawberries pointing out.
PLACE remaining 1/4 cup preserves in small microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on HIGH 10 seconds to warm. Stir. Spoon evenly over strawberries to coat.

PLACE white baking chips and remaining 1/2 teaspoon oil in small heavy-duty resealable plastic bag. Seal. Microwave on HIGH 20 seconds. Knead. Microwave at additional 5 second intervals until chips are just melted and smooth when kneaded. Cut an extremely small corner off bottom of bag. Drizzle evenly over strawberries in a looping pattern to resemble flower petals. Chill 10 minutes or longer to set drizzle.

name: Buffalo Wings / Drumettes
instructions: Place a steamer basket in sauce pan and then fill with just enough water to where the steamer basket is just above the surface of the water. Prepare your wings by removing the tips and cutting at the joint or just use drumettes.  Remove the basket from the saucepan and distribute the wings in the basket so that they are not touching. Place saucepan over high heat, cover and bring to a boil.

Carefully place the steamer basket back into the saucepan while the water is boiling (remember the water should not be touching the wings, we want steamed not boiled) reduce the heat to medium and cover.  Let the wings steam for 10 minutes.
Remove the wings and pat them dry (drier the better).  Place the wings on a cooling rack and let sit for five minutes.  Place cooling rack on a baking sheet and put in the refrigerator for 1 hr.
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.

Line baking sheet with parchment paper and distribute wings onto sheet, once again not touching.  Season with salt and pepper. Place sheet with wings on middle rack and bake for 15-20 minutes per side.
Melt butter.  Combine melted butter, brown sugar, minced garlic, hot sauce, onion powder, and red pepper flakes into large bowl (large enough for all the chicken to fit into).  Mix ingredients well.
Remove wings from oven and immediately transfer to bowl with sauce.  Toss so that wings are well coated with sauce.  Serve warm.  Enjoy!

name: Tandoori-Style Sheet Pan Chicken

ingredients.name: boneless skinless chicken breasts
ingredients.fullName: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (4 oz. each)

instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F.
Line a sheet pan with parchment paper and set aside.
Pound the chicken breasts gently to tenderize them.
Whisk together the yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, garam masala, paprika, salt, coriander, cumin, turmeric, and pepper. Add the chicken breasts to the bowl and marinate for 30 minutes

While the chicken marinates, cut the potatoes into quarters. Toss with the oil and salt to coat. When the chicken is finished marinating, arrange the chicken pieces on the sheet pan, discarding any excess yogurt. Nestle in the potatoes.
Bake on middle rack of oven for 20 minutes. Using tongs, turn over chicken pieces.
Bake for an additional 10 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F.
Check to see that chicken is done. Remove from oven or add time as needed.
Transfer the chicken to a cutting board and slice. Plate the chicken with the potatoes on a serving platter and garnish with fresh cilantro. Serve immediately.

name: Fig and Almond Tart
instructions: Melt the butter with the maple syrup.
Let cool and add the flour and the whisked egg.
Knead well until a homogeneous dough is formed.
Shape the dough into a ball, wrap in plastic wrap, and refrigerate for about 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 360°F.
Remove the dough from the refrigerator and roll out into a rectangular shape with a thickness of about 4 millimeters.
Place the dough in a greased pie pan, spread it evenly and prick the base with a fork.
Cover the dough with parchment paper and dried beans on top (to weigh down the dough so it doesn't rise) while baking for about 15 minutes.
Prepare the filling by whisking the softened butter with the sugar and almonds for about 5 minutes.
Add the eggs, one by one and the cinnamon, and whisk some more.
Remove the dough from the oven, remove the paper and the weights, and add the filling, smoothing the surface.
Halve the figs and arrange them on top of the filling.
Bake for about 20 minutes.
Once cooled, remove from the pan and serve.

name: "Farta-Rapazes" cookies
instructions: Break the eggs into a bowl and add the sugar. Beat with an electric mixer until you get a white, creamy dough. Stirring constantly, add the milk and the olive oil. Add the sifted flour, baking powder, cinnamon and lemon zest.
Add the brandy and stop beating.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease it with butter and dust with flour.
Place scoops of the dough on the baking sheet and bake in pre-heated oven at 375°F for 20 minutes.

name: Baked Artichoke Squares

ingredients.name: Pillsbury BEST All Purpose Flour
ingredients.fullName: 1 1/2 cups Pillsbury BEST All Purpose Flour

instructions: HEAT oven to 350ºF. Spray a 13 x 9-inch baking pan with no-stick cooking spray.

HEAT 3 tablespoons oil in medium skillet. Add mushrooms, celery and garlic. Sauté until celery is tender. Remove from heat. Stir in artichoke hearts, green onion, marjoram, oregano and cayenne. Add cheeses and eggs. Mix well. Set aside.

COMBINE flour and salt in medium bowl. Blend 1/2 cup oil and milk in small bowl; add to flour mixture. Stir with fork until mixture forms a ball. Press dough in bottom and slightly up sides of prepared pan.
SPREAD cheese mixture on crust; bake 30 minutes, or until center is set. Cool slightly. Cut into 24 squares. Serve warm.

name: Overnight French Toast

ingredients.name: loaf italian bread, cut into
ingredients.fullName: 1 loaf italian bread, cut into (8, 1-inch thick slices)

instructions: Mix eggs, milk, vanilla and baking powder. Pour over bread to soak; turn to coat well. Cover. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
Preheat oven to 450°F. Mix strawberries, bananas and granulated sugar in 13x9-inch baking dish. Top with soaked bread slices. Sprinkle with cinnamon sugar.
Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.

name: Quick and Easy White Chocolate Pudding
instructions: Heat the chocolate in bain-marie. Smooth it.
Off the heat, add the Greek yogurt while mixing with a whisk.
Pour into small glasses and leave in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
At the last minute, top with the chopped strawberries.

name: Original Florentine Schiacciata Recipe
instructions: To prepare the yeast starter:
Dissolve the brewer’s yeast in 30 grams of warm water, add 150 grams of flour and let the starter rise overnight.
The next day:
Add the eggs, the remaining flour, lard, sugar, honey, vanilla extract, and the orange juice and peel, knead until the dough is smooth and uniform in consistency.
Roll out the dough and place it in a deep rectangular baking pan greased with lard.
Let the dough rise for approximately 2 hours.
Bake in a preheated oven at 180C for approximately 40 minutes. It should be a hazelnut color, approximately 4 centimeters in thickness.
Let it cool, remove it from the pan and sprinkle with powdered sugar. The lily, emblem of Florence, is normally stenciled with powdered cocoa in the center of the cake.

name: Churros
instructions: In a saucepan, add the water and cinnamon stick and cook over high heat until the water reduces to 1 cup.
Remove the cinnamon, then add a pinch of salt and the butter. Continue to cook until the butter melts.
Remove from the stove. Add the flour and mix using a wooden spoon until there are no lumps. Let the batter cool for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, heat the oil until it reaches 180 degrees Celsius.
Add the cheese to the batter and mix, then add the egg. Stir until the mix is smooth, which might take a few minutes.
Add the batter into a pastry bag with a star tip.
Once the oil is hot, create the churros directly into the hot oil. Cut into sections with scissors to avoid burns.
Cook until golden brown. Remove and drain the excess oil by placing the churros on top of absorbent paper towels. Once they are cool, cover with a sugar and cinnamon mixture.

name: Classic American Bagels
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine flour, yeast, salt,  water, honey, and olive oil.
Knead the dough in a food processor for 10 minutes.
Divide the dough into 12 balls and stretch them into strands 25 cms long. Wrap a strand around your hand and seal the two ends together, pressing lightly.
Arrange them on an oiled baking sheet and let rise 2 hours.
Preheat the oven to 225 degrees Celsius.
Heat 3 liters of water in a pot, add cornstarch, sugar and salt (2 tablespoon) and bring to a boil.
Poach the bagels for 2 minutes.
Arrange them on a baking sheet lined with buttered parchment paper and sprinkled with a pinch of cornmeal.
Lower the oven temperature to 215 C and bake for 20-25 minutes.

name: Mini Hot Dogs
instructions: Add the flour, yeast, egg, and 200 grams of milk to a bowl. Mix well.
Knead the ingredients together, and then add the sugar, salt, and butter.
Knead for approximately 10 minutes until the dough is soft, uniform, and elastic in consistency. Add more flour, if necessary.
Place the dough in a well-oiled bowl covered with plastic wrap in a warm area for an hour.
Dust a work surface with flour. Flatten the dough lightly and cut it into small pieces, weighing approximately 60 grams each.
Shape each piece into a cylinder, flatten the pieces and stretch them slightly. Brush them with mustard or ketchup, place a hot dog in the center and seal them closed.
Place the rolls on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, cover them with plastic wrap and let them rise for another 45 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 230 degrees Celsius.
Brush the rolls with milk and sprinkle with the grated cheese.
Bake for 5 minutes, and then lower the temperature to 210 C, and bake for 7 more minutes.
Remove the rolls from the oven and place them on a wire rack to cool, covered with a kitchen towel. Serve warm.

name: Rack of Pork with Parsleyed Crumbs

ingredients.prep: chine bone trimmed, about 7 or 8 ribs
ingredients.name: rack pork rib rack
ingredients.fullName: 1 rack pork rib rack (chine bone trimmed, about 7 or 8 ribs)

instructions: Heat oven to 350 degrees F.

Season pork with salt and pepper, as desired. Brush pork with 1/4 cup mustard. In medium bowl, combine remaining mustard with remaining ingredients. Press crumb mixture evenly over top of pork. Arrange pork crumb side up in roasting pan. Roast for 1 1/2 hours (20 minutes per pound), or until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees F. Remove roast from oven; let rest about 10 minutes.  Carve pork, cutting between ribs, and serve.

name: Tomato Soup with Poblano Peppers, Corn, and Chicken
instructions: Blend the tomatoes, onion, and garlic with the water or chicken broth in a blender.
Heat the vegetable oil in a skillet and add the blended mixture, allowing it to bubble for 6 minutes until it becomes thicker and changes in color.
Stir in the poblano pepper strips, corn, and chicken. Cook for 5 minutes.
Serve along with panela cheese, if desired.

name: Autumn Colored Dessert
instructions: Peel the oranges, removing as much as possible of all the white parts and cut into slices.
Place the oranges in the serving bowl.
Add the pomegranate seeds, the sugar, the cinnamon, and the port wine and mix gently. Mix in the cinnamon sticks and honey.
Keep in the fridge until serving.

name: Filipino Lumpia
instructions: In a mixing bowl combine pork, shrimp, green onions, water chestnuts, soy sauce, garlic, salt, garlic powder, black pepper, parsley, and onions.
Add 1 beaten egg to the mixture and mix well.
Take 1 egg and separate the egg yolk from the egg white. Lightly beat the egg white.

Place 1 to 1 1/2 tablespoons of the mixture diagonally on the lumpia wrapper starting near one corner of the wrapper. Fold the side of the wrapper over the length of the filling. Tuck in both ends and neatly roll. Seal the lumpia using egg whites. The egg whites will hold the lumpia wrapper together. Repeat until you are out of the mixture.
Heat the cooking oil in a deep fryer to 350 degrees
Working in batches, cook lumpia in the deep fryer for 10 to 13 minutes each until golden brown.
Using a slotted spoon, remove and drain oil from the lumpia on a paper towel
Serve hot with sweet and sour sauce or garlic vinegar sauce.

name: Catfish Curry With Basmati Rice
instructions: In a pan, saute the onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add the coriander powder, dried parsley, cumin, Indian saffron, pepper, fennel seeds, and coriander grains.
Mix for 1 minute to release the flavors.  If mixture is too dry, add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water.
Add tomatoes and the tomato paste, and cook covered mixture reduces in volume, and mixture is soft.
Add the fish, seasoned with salt, and when it starts to get an opaque color, add the coconut milk.  Cover the pot to create steam, and create a sauce.  Simmer until fish is cooked.
Remove from heat, and add the fresh coriander.
For basmati rice, add 1 cup of rice and 2 cups of hot water to a pan, cover, and cook over medium heat, until all the water is absorbed and holes are formed.
Turn off the heat, add a drizzle of olive oil (optional), and separate the grains with a fork.
Serve the curry hot, garnished with arugula, and accompanied with the rice.

name: Spiced Dried Fruit Cake with Rum Butter Glaze

ingredients.name: unsalted butter
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup unsalted butter (plus more for buttering pan)

ingredients.name: heavy whipping cream
ingredients.fullName: 1 tablespoon heavy whipping cream (at room temperature)

instructions: Special Equipment: KitchenAid® Stand Mixer; KitchenAid® Sifter + Scale Attachment; One 9-in/23-cm cake pan with 1 1/2-in-4-cm-sides; parchment paper

In a large bowl, combine all the dried fruits (golden raisins, currants, sweetened dried cranberries, dried cherries, dried chopped apricots, candied citron), candied ginger, and orange zest. Add the 1 cup rum and stir well to combine. Cover with plastic wrap and set aside at room temperature for 3 hours or overnight.

In a large saucepan, set over medium heat, melt the 1/2 cup + 2 Tbs butter. Add the1 cup sugar and stir to dissolve the sugar. Add the prepared macerated fruit, along with 1 cup apple juice and spices (cinnamon, ginger, cardamom, allspice). Increase the heat to medium-high and bring the mixture to a boil, stirring frequently. Once it has reached a boil, reduce the heat to low, and cook at a bare simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and set aside to cool for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Once cool, stir in the 1 teaspoon vanilla extract.

Meanwhile, position an oven rack in the center of the oven and preheat the oven to 325ºF/160ºC/gas 3. Generously butter the bottom and sides of the cake pan. Line the bottom of the pan with a circle of parchment paper, and butter the parchment. Set aside.

Attach the KitchenAid® Sifter + Scale Attachment to your KitchenAid® Stand Mixer fitted with the flat beater. Transfer the fruit mixture to the bowl of the mixer. Close the ingredient valve. Weigh the flour (7 oz), salt 0.24 oz), baking powder (0.14 oz), and baking soda (0.21 oz) in the ingredient hopper, taring the scale between ingredients. Turn the mixer to medium-low speed, open the ingredient valve, and sift the flour mixture into the mixing bowl. Mix just until the flour disappears, about 30 seconds. Turn the mixer off.

In a small bowl, beat the 2 eggs with a fork. Turn the mixer to medium-low, add the eggs and mix just until combined. Remove the mixer bowl, and use a rubber spatula to blend in any flour remaining on the sides of the bowl. Fold in the 1/2 cup toasted pecans.
Note: To toast the nuts, spread them in a single layer on a small rimmed baking sheet, and bake until fragrant and starting to color, 5 to 8 minutes. Set aside to cool.

Pour the batter into the prepared pan and spread evenly with a small offset spatula. Bake the fruitcake until the top is deeply golden brown, and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 55 to 60 minutes. Set the cake on a wire rack. While still hot, brush the top of the fruitcake with 1 to 2 tablespoons of the rum. Let the fruitcake cool to room temperature in the pan.

Once the cake is cool, make the glaze. Attach the KitchenAid® Sifter + Scale Attachment to your KitchenAid® Stand Mixer fitted with the wire whip. Close the ingredient valve. Weigh the confectioners’ sugar (4 oz) in the ingredient hopper. In the bowl of the mixer, combine the 2 Tbs melted butter, 1 1/2 Tbs rum, 1 Tbs cream, 1/2 tsp vanilla extract, and 1/4 tsp salt. Mix on medium-low speed until smooth, about 1 minute. Open the ingredient valve, and sift in the powdered sugar. Increase the mixer to medium, and beat until smooth, stopping the mixer once to scrape down the sides of the bowl. Use a rubber spatula to incorporate any remaining bits of confectioners’ sugar.

To finish the cake, run a table knife around the inside edge of the pan to loosen the cake. Invert the cake onto a wire rack, peel off the parchment paper, and then turn the cake right side up. Place the cake on a wire rack with a baking sheet underneath to catch any drips. Pour the glaze over the cake, and use a small offset spatula to gently push the glaze evenly to the edges so it drips down the sides of the cake. Allow the glaze to set before transferring the cake to a cake plate. Cut into wedges when ready to serve. The cake can be made up to 2 days in advance. Store the cake for up to one week in a covered cake box at room temperature.

name: Spiked Strawberry Slushies for a Crowd
instructions: Put frozen strawberries, pomegranate juice, orange juice, vodka, and agave in a high-powered blender. Process on high until mixture is smooth and icy, about 30 seconds.
Taste slushies and blend in more vodka and agave nectar if you like.
Pour slushies into glasses and serve immediately.﻿

name: Bacon & Cheddar Potato Salad

ingredients.name: ounds red bliss potatoes
ingredients.fullName: 2 pounds red bliss potatoes (cut into 3/4-inch cubes)

ingredients.name: hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise
ingredients.fullName: 1 cup hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise

ingredients.name: white, white wine, red vinegar
ingredients.fullName: 1 tablespoon white, white wine, red vinegar

instructions: In 4-quart saucepot, cover potatoes with water; bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender; drain and cool slightly.
Meanwhile, in large bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Add potatoes and toss to coat. Season, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

name: Maple-bourbon Glazed Chicken

ingredients.name: Hellmann's or Best Foods Real Mayonnaise
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup Hellmann's or Best Foods Real Mayonnaise

instructions: Heat oil in medium saucepan over medium-high heat and cook onion, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes or until golden. Add syrup, ketchup, bourbon and hot pepper sauce. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes or until sauce is slightly thickened. Remove from heat. With wire whisk, stir in Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise until smooth.
Grill or broil chicken, turning occasionally and brushing frequently with sauce, 40 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.

name: Stir-Fry Vegetables

ingredients.name: red bell pepper
ingredients.fullName: 1 red bell pepper (large, cut into strips)

instructions: Heat the oil in wok or large deep skillet on medium-high heat. Add onion and carrots; stir fry 2 minutes. Add remaining vegetables; stir fry 5 to 7 minutes or until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce, garlic powder and ginger; stir-fry until well blended. Sprinkle with sesame seed. Serve over cooked rice, if desired.

name: Codfish Delight
instructions: Soak, clean, and shred the cod.
Bring a pan of water to a boil, and blanch the cod. Set aside.
Heat the oven to 150 degrees Celsius.
Put the tomato paste in a bowl, and mix with a hand mixer.
Add the eggs and mix well.
Finally, add the cod and the potatoes. Mix well.
Pour into an oven-safe tray, and bake until browned.

name: Crispy Polenta Fries With Ricotta, And Sage Salt.
instructions: In a small bowl, mix the salt and the chopped sage leaves.
In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, add the chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add the polenta. Stir regularly, until the polenta it detaches from the sides of the pan, about 30 minutes.
Add the butter, Parmesan, some chopped sage leaves, and a little rosemary sprig, mixing well. Add the Ricotta.
Pour this mixture into a flexible 22 cm square pan or a greased baking dish, smooth the surface with a spatual and allow it to cool for 2 hours in the refrigerator, until the polenta is set.
Heat 1 cm of olive oil in a frying pan.
Cut the polenta into sticks, and quickly deep-fry them.
Serve polenta fries with the salt and sage mix.

name: Milk Braid with Sultana grapes

ingredients.name: egg
ingredients.fullName: 1 egg (+ 1 tablespoon of milk for brushing)

instructions: Mix well the margarine with the baking powder, the milk, the beaten egg, the salt and the sugar.
When the mixture is homogeneous, involve the flour and stir with your hands until the dough is with a soft touch.
Pour the dough on a floured surface and divide into smaller balls.
Make rolls out of each ball and put some sultana grapes on top of them.
Fold in half and stretch again until they roll.
Braid three rolls and place on a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
Do not put too close braids because the dough, while baking, doubles in size!
Let braid in a warm place for one hour.
One our later, brush the braids with the beaten egg with milk and garnish with some sultana grapes.
Bake in hot oven (400 ° F) for 25 minutes.

name: Eggs Baked in Avocado
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.

Slice the avocados in half and discard the pits. Use a spoon to scoop out a portion of the flesh from the center of each half, leaving a 1/2-inch border of flesh in the skin. Reserve the scooped-out avocado flesh for another use. (Pro Tip: Use the largest avocados possible to ensure that a full egg can fit inside!)

Arrange the avocado halves cut side up in a square baking dish. Sprinkle the cavities with salt and black pepper. Carefully crack an egg into the center of each half and season with additional salt and black pepper to taste.
Bake the eggs on the middle rack of the oven until the whites are set, 15-20 minutes.
Check to see that eggs are done. Remove from oven or add time as needed.
Serve immediately.

name: Grandma's Broa Bread - Thermomix recipe
instructions: Chop the walnuts for a few seconds on speed 4. Remove from the Thermomix and set aside.
Weigh the flour and set aside.
Put the water in the Thermomix cup and program to 3 minutes, temperature 100, speed 5.
When the water is hot, add the nuts, water, olive oil, honey, brown sugar, cinnamon, and fennel. Program for 5 minutes, temperature 100, speed 3.
Add 125 grams of flour and set to 5 minutes, temperature 100, speed 3.
When it's done, add the remaining flour and program again for 3 minutes, temperature 100, speed 3.
Check for flour on the walls of the cup. If there is any, clean it with a spatula and program for 1 minute, temperature 100, speed 3.
Remove the cup and let it cool for a while.
Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Line a baking tray with a non-stick mat.
When the dough is at a manageable temperature, form small scones and place them on the tray.
Use a fork to lightly tread the dough.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven and cool for 10 to 15 minutes in the pan.
While they're still hot/warm, coat with white sugar.

name: Banh Mi Vietnamese Sandwiches

ingredients.name: wish-bone light asian sesame ginger vinaigrette dressing
ingredients.fullName: 3/4 cup wish-bone light asian sesame ginger vinaigrette dressing (divided)

ingredients.name: Hellmann's or Best Foods Real Mayonnaise
ingredients.fullName: 1/4 cup Hellmann's or Best Foods Real Mayonnaise

ingredients.prep: sliced lengthwise and cut into 4 pieces
ingredients.name: nches French baguette
ingredients.fullName: 16 inches French baguette (sliced lengthwise and cut into 4 pieces)

instructions: Pour remaining 1/2 cup Dressing over chicken in large, shallow nonaluminum baking dish or resealable plastic bag; turn to coat. Cover, or close bag, and marinate in refrigerator 30 minutes, turning occasionally.
Toss carrots, radishes and 1/4 cup Dressing in medium bowl; cover and set aside.
Remove chicken from marinade, discarding marinade. Grill or broil chicken, turning once, until chicken is thoroughly cooked, about 10 minutes. Cut into thin slices.

Strain vegetables and discard liquid. Combine Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise, lime juice, cilantro and chili sauce in small bowl. Evenly spread mayonnaise mixture on bread, then top with chicken, cucumber and marinated vegetables.

name: Panna Cotta with Lemon Jelly

ingredients.name: vanilla soy milk
ingredients.fullName: 200 milliliters vanilla soy milk (or whole milk)

ingredients.prep: or non-dairy cream or milk cream
ingredients.name: cream
ingredients.fullName: 200 milliliters cream (or non-dairy cream or milk cream)

ingredients.prep: or 60 gr. granulated or raw sugar
ingredients.name: grams fructose
ingredients.fullName: 40 grams fructose (or 60 gr. granulated or raw sugar)

instructions: To prepare the panna cotta, heat the milk in a medium saucepan with the fructose, the thyme twig, and the filtered juice of half a lemon, without bringing the mixture to a boil.
Slice the vanilla bean lengthwise and add it to the mixture with the agar agar, stir with a whisk to dissolve the agar agar completely.
Bring the mixture to a boil for a few minutes on low heat, remove the saucepan from the stove and incorporate the cream.
Filter the mixture to eliminate the thyme and the vanilla bean and pour it in individual bowls.
Cool completely, then refrigerate to set well.
To prepare the lemon jelly, filter the lemon juice with a sieve.
Add the water and place the mixture in a medium saucepan on low heat with the sugar, the fresh thyme, and the lemon peel.
As soon as the mixture begins to boil, add the agar agar and stir with a whisk to eliminate any lumps.
Boil the mixture for a few minutes and remove the saucepan from the heat.
Eliminate the fresh time by filtering the mixture and cool it completely.
Remove the panna cotta from the refrigerator and add the cold jelly to the top.
Return the panna cotta to the refrigerator for an additional 2 to 3 hours before serving.

name: Aromatic Herb Bread
instructions: In a bowl, dissolve the yeast with half of the water.
Add some of both flours, and then add the basil, parsley, garlic, rosemary, thyme, oil, and salt.
Add the remaining flour and water and stir until the flour is mixed well and a dough forms. Dough should be smooth, but not sticky.
Turn out the dough on to a floured surface and knead until soft and pliable.
Place in a bowl, brush with oil, cover and leave to rise for about 1 1/2 hours.
Turn out on to a floured surface, knead again briefly, and form into a loaf shape.
Place in a lightly greased ring pan and join the ends to form a ring.
Allow to rise for about 45 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Gently brush with dough's surface with water and bake for 20 minutes. Turn the oven down to 180 C and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove from oven and the bread from the mold. Place a rack on a baking sheet and place the bread on the rack. Put the bread back into the oven for 10 minutes.
Take the bread out of the oven.
Cut into slices and serve warm.

name: Lamb with Honey and Apricots

ingredients.name: kilogram leg lamb
ingredients.fullName: 1 kilogram leg of lamb (deboned and diced)

ingredients.prep: tied with thread to resemble a bouquet garni
ingredients.name: bunch coriander
ingredients.fullName: 1 bunch coriander (tied with thread to resemble a bouquet garni)

ingredients.prep: or 500 gr. fresh apricots, washed and de-stoned
ingredients.name: grams dried apricots
ingredients.fullName: 250 grams dried apricots (or 500 gr. fresh apricots, washed and de-stoned)

instructions: Melt the butter in a large heavy pan.
Add the spices and fry for a few minutes. Stir continuously so as not to burn.
Add the lamb and fry gently for a few minutes until brown.
Add the onion and stock. Stir and add the coriander bunch.
Leave to cook gently on low for 1 hour.
Then add the apricots and honey, and cook for a further 15 minutes until the lamb is tender. Remove the coriander bunch.
Bring the water to a boil with a pinch of salt.
Place the couscous in a bowl and add the boiling water, cover and leave to rest for a few minutes. Break up any lumps of couscous with a fork.
Serve the couscous topped with the lamb and garnish with flaked almonds.

name: Couscous Salad With Arugula, Mozzarella, Strawberries, Dried Tomato, and Green Sauce
instructions: Couscous: Put the couscous in a bowl and add 200 milliliters of boiling water, or enough to cover the couscous.
Wait until all the water is absorbed and separate the grains with a fork.
Spread the couscous on a platter.
On top of the couscous, arrange the arugula, strawberries,​​ mozzarella, and dried tomatoes.
Season with the Green Sauce.
Green Sauce: Place all the ingredients in a blender and grind finely.

name: Souper Roasted Chicken

ingredients.name: lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix
ingredients.fullName: 1 lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix

instructions: Preheat oven to 425°.
Arrange chicken in broiler pan without the rack; brush with Soup Mix blended with olive oil.
Roast chicken, basting occasionally, 40 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. Remove chicken to serving platter and keep warm.
Add hot water to pan and stir, scraping brown bits from bottom of pan. Serve pan juices over chicken along with Knorr® Pasta Sides™ - Chicken.

name: Pasta With Fresh Tomatoes & Basil
instructions: Heat oil in 12-inch skillet over medium heat and cook garlic 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and basil and cook, stirring frequently, 3 minutes or until tomatoes are tender. Add water and milk and bring to the boiling point. Stir in Knorr® Pasta Sides™ - Alfredo and continue boiling over medium heat, stirring occasionally, 9 minutes or until pasta is tender; add black pepper. Sprinkle, if desired, with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Saucy Pork and Peppers

ingredients.prep: each cut into 8 pieces and seeded
ingredients.name: edium tomatoes
ingredients.fullName: 2 medium tomatoes (each cut into 8 pieces and seeded)
