Toast the pita bread until golden brown and cut into halves. Spread with mayonnaise and place lettuce, tomato, and onion into each pita. Put the hamburger and cheese into each pita, add mustard, jalapeno, and pickles, and serve.

name: Tumeric Fried Chicken

ingredients.prep: as much as you can to evenly coat the chicken that you have
ingredients.name: eggs
ingredients.fullName: eggs (as much as you can to evenly coat the chicken that you have)

instructions: 1. Dip the chicken in a mixture of eggs, tumeric powder, salt and pepper'.

2. Take the plain flour, tumeric powder, salt, and pepper and mix it together. one way to do this is to put everything in a sieve, mix it all up in the seive, and slowly stir the inside of the seive to get a nicely mixed flour. good dusting.. i think thats what people call it.

3. Dust the egg drenched chicken pieces with the flour mix. Just keep dusting and dusting... and shake off the excess and leave for a while. This lets the egg and the flour mix 'bond'. bonding is good. because if bonding does not happen, the dusting will break off when you fry.

4. Once you've waited long enough, just deep fry the chicken in oil. But remember, the oil has to be really hot when you put the chicken pieces in. After you hear a little bit of sizzle, turn the heat down. Leave it for about 15 minutes. Or if you don't have a deep dryer, just shallow fry, turning it once every 7 minutes.. (or longer, depending on the thickness of your chicken pieces).

name: Saucy Pizza Pockets

ingredients.name: mozzarella cheese
ingredients.fullName: 2/3 cup mozzarella cheese (shredded OR pizza blend cheese)

instructions: Heat oven to 425 degrees F. Place ground pork and garlic salt in large skillet over medium-high heat; cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until pork is no longer pink. Stir in pizza sauce and cook, stirring, until heated through.

Spray a large baking sheet with cooking spray. Flatten each biscuit into a 4-inch circle. Spoon 1 tablespoon of meat sauce onto one side of the biscuit. Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon of cheese and top with 2 slices of pepperoni or Canadian bacon. Fold dough over the filling, forming a half-moon shape. Pinch edges to seal well. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Sprinkle with additional cheese if desired. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden brown.

name: Pho With Wontons, Soft-boiled Egg and Pig Ear Noodles
instructions: For the Wontons: Mix filling ingredients together and add 1 Tbs. of filling to wonton wrappers, seal with a corn starch wash and fold into wonton shape .
For the Pork Broth: Mix pork stock with aromatics, simmer until desired consistency.
For the Noodles: Prepare ear in an equilibrium brine, season with lemon, thyme and olive oil. Circulate overnight, julienne into 4.In boiling stock add noodles and wonton until cooked through.

name: Alfredo with Chicken & Tomato

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
ingredients.fullName: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves (about 1-1/4 lbs.)

ingredients.prep: or 1/2 cup shredded Mozzarella cheese, about 2 oz.
ingredients.name: slices mozzarella cheese
ingredients.fullName: 4 slices mozzarella cheese (or 1/2 cup shredded Mozzarella cheese, about 2 oz.)

instructions: unchecked 1. Dip chicken in egg, then bread crumbs. Heat olive oil in 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and lightly brown chicken. Remove chicken and set aside.
unchecked 2. Stir sauce into same skillet and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Return chicken to skillet; arrange 1 tomato slice on each chicken breast half. Cover and simmer 5 minutes.

unchecked 3. Evenly top chicken with cheese and simmer covered an additional 2 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. Serve, if desired, over hot cooked pasta and garnish with chopped fresh basil or parsley.

name: Grilled Vegetable Wraps
instructions: Spritz the grill with cooking spray and grill the vegetables on medium-high heat until cooked thoroughly.
Whisk together the mustard, parsley, and olive oil to make the dressing.
Toss the grilled vegetables with the dressing.
Heat the tortillas until soft and manageable and spread with cream cheese. Fill with the vegetables. Roll into a burrito shape and heat on the grill until brown in spots. Serve.

name: Angel Food Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Grease an angel food cake pan and line with parchment paper.
In a bowl, beat the eggs, yolks, sugar, zest, and a pinch of salt for 30 minutes by hand, or for 10 minutes with an electric mixer, until you get a thick, pale mixture.
Add the flour and mix until smooth.
Pour the batter in the pan and bake for 30 to 40 minutes until done. Do the toothpick test.

name: Chocolate Pudding with Whipped Cream

ingredients.prep: or enough to line the pan
ingredients.name: ladyfingers
ingredients.fullName: 1 package ladyfingers (or enough to line the pan)

instructions: Spread liquid caramel on the bottom of a rectangular pan.
Top caramel with ladyfingers dipped in milk.
Make pudding according to package instructions (using 1 liter milk and 8 tablespoons sugar).
Pour pudding mixture over ladyfingers. Cover and refrigerate.
When chilled, beat cream and 4 tablespoons sugar until stiff peaks form.
Spread whipped cream over pudding.
Garnish with grated chocolate.

name: Apple and Zucchini Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Grease a rectangular baking pan with butter, and sprinkle with flour.
Whisk the butter with the sugar, then add the slightly whisked eggs.
Add and mix in the flour, baking powder, and sugar.
Grate the zucchini, apple, and lemon zest. Add to flour mixture, and stir well until getting a homogeneous dough.
Pour in pan, and bake for 45 to 50 minutes.
Prepare the syrup by mixing the powdered sugar with lemon juice, and the food coloring of your choice.
Remove from oven, and when cool, pour syrup on top.

name: Sweet & Sour Pork

ingredients.name: boneless pork
ingredients.fullName: 14 pounds boneless pork (cut into ½ inch cubes)

instructions: Coat pork cubes with flour.
Sauté in cooking oil for approximately 10 minutes.
Drain.
Drain pineapple, saving 1½ qt. juice.
Add pineapple juice, stock, vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, tomato paste and spices to the pork.
Bring mixture to a boil.
Reduce heat and cover. Simmer for 45 minutes.
Steam vegetables for 3 minutes.
Drain well.
Add vegetables to the pork mixture.
In a sauce pan, combine cornstarch and water.
Stir until combined
Add cornstarch mixture and pineapple chunks to the pork mixture.
Gently stir and heat to 160ºF.
Place mixture into serving pans.
Serve over hot cooked rice.
Pour mixture in 2 inch shallow pans. Cover and place in refrigerator. Cool to 40ºF within 4 hours.
Reheat product to 165ºF or higher for at least 1 minute. Hold at 140ºF or higher to serve.

name: Crustless Coconut Milk and Vegetable Quiche
instructions: Wash and slice the leeks.
Grate the carrots.
Heat a little olive oil in a skillet, add the leeks and carrots and saute. Season with salt and pepper.
Cool.
Preheat oven to 400F
In a bowl, beat the eggs, add the flour, coconut milk, and grated cheese.
Add the vegetables and mix well.
Pour into a square baking dish.
Bake for 40 minutes.

name: Orange and Vanilla Coffee Cake

ingredients.name: vanilla bean
ingredients.fullName: 1 vanilla bean (or two teaspoon vanilla extract)

instructions: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Grease a round cake pan with butter and sprinkle it with flour. Set it aside.
Beat the eggs and stir in the sugar, mixing them well.
When the mix turns into a whitish cream, add the orange zest and juice, olive oil, yogurt, and grated coconut. Beat again until it turns into a cream.
Open the vanilla bean lengthwise and scrape out the contents with a knife.
Add the brown sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda.
Mix until everything is blended, being careful not to over mix.
Pour the dough into the cake pan and bake for about 30 to 35 minutes.
Check with a toothpick, then remove the cake once it is finished and remove it from the cake pan.
When it is cold, dust the cake with powdered sugar (optional), and serve with fresh orange juice.

name: Easy Mexican Corn and Rice Casserole

ingredients.name: frozen corn kernels
ingredients.fullName: 4 cups frozen corn kernels (thawed and drained)

ingredients.name: shredded Mexican blend cheese
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup shredded Mexican blend cheese (for corn mixture)

ingredients.name: shredded Mexican blend cheese
ingredients.fullName: 1 cup shredded Mexican blend cheese (for topping)

instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Spray a 9x13-inch casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray. Set aside.

Place corn kernels, cooked rice, salsa, sour cream, scallions, cumin, garlic powder, salt, black pepper, and shredded cheese in a large mixing bowl. Fold ingredients together with a rubber spatula until thoroughly combined.
Transfer mixture to prepared casserole dish and smooth it into an even layer. Sprinkle shredded cheese evenly over the top.
Bake casserole for 35-40 minutes on middle rack of oven, until cheese is golden-brown and casserole is gently bubbling at the edges.
Check to see that casserole is done. Carefully remove from oven or add time as needed.
Allow casserole to rest for 15 minutes before serving.

name: "Som Tam" Green Papaya Salad
instructions: Peel the papaya and cut it in half lengthwise.
Using a spoon, remove the small seeds.
Grate the papaya as you grate carrots.
Cut the pepper in half lengthwise and also remove the seeds (the pungent taste is mainly in the seeds).
Chop finely.
In a bowl, mix all ingredients and refrigerator for at least an hour.

name: Teriyaki Pork Skewers
instructions: In medium bowl, stir together green onion, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, soy sauce and sherry. Add pork, toss lightly to coat well. Cover and marinate in refrigerate at least one hour.
Prepare medium-hot fire in grill; remove pork from marinade, discarding marinade, and thread onto skewers. Grill directly over fire, turning to brown evenly, for 4-5 minutes.

name: Pork Chops and Mushroom Gravy

ingredients.prep: sliced, OR 2 6 1/2-oz cans mushroom pieces, drained
ingredients.name: fresh mushrooms
ingredients.fullName: 8 ounces fresh mushrooms (sliced, OR 2 6 1/2-oz cans mushroom pieces, drained)

ingredients.name: thyme
ingredients.fullName: 1 teaspoon thyme (OR 1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves)

instructions: Season chops with salt and pepper, set aside. In medium skillet sauté mushrooms in butter until tender, about 5-6 minutes. (If using canned mushrooms, omit butter and sautéing step). Layer chops, mushrooms, onion and thyme in 4-quart slow cooker; pour soup over all. Cover and cook on low heat setting for 7-8 hours, until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees F.  Allow to rest 3 minutes before serving.

name: Smoked Mozzarella & Turkey Heroes

ingredients.name: Best Foods Dijonnaise Creamy Dijon Mustard
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup Best Foods Dijonnaise Creamy Dijon Mustard

ingredients.prep: chopped, or 1/2 tsp dried basil leaves, crushed
ingredients.name: fresh basil leaves
ingredients.fullName: 3 tablespoons fresh basil leaves (chopped, or 1/2 tsp dried basil leaves, crushed)

instructions:
1. In small bowl, combine Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Dijonnaise  Creamy Dijon Mustard and basil; set aside.
 
2. Cut rolls lengthwise in half and spread with basil mixture. Top with arugula, turkey, mozzarella and roasted peppers.
 
 
*To use dehydrated sun-dried tomatoes, cover with boiling water and let stand 10 minutes or until tender; drain.

name: Bertolli Lasagna
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°. In large bowl, combine ricotta cheese, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, eggs, salt and pepper; set aside.

Spread 1 cup Sauce in 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Layer 4 lasagna noodles, then 1 cup Sauce and 1/2 of the ricotta mixture. Top with 1/3 of the mozzarella cheese; repeat. Top with remaining 4 noodles, then 1 cup Sauce and remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.

Cover with aluminum foil and bake 1 hour. Remove foil and top with remaining mozzarella cheese. Bake an additional 10 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. Garnish, if desired, with fresh basil leaves. Serve with remaining Sauce, heated.

name: Roasted Paprika Cornish Hens

ingredients.name: black pepper
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 teaspoon black pepper (McCormick Gourmet™ Organic, Coarse Ground)

instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Place hens on rack in shallow roasting pan. Brush with oil
Mix paprika, rosemary, garlic powder, sea salt, thyme and pepper in small bowl. Rub evenly over entire surface of hens
Roast 1 to 1 1/4 hours until hens are cooked through

name: Creamy White Bean & Sausage Zoodles

ingredients.prep: washed, cut in half and ends trimmed, about 5 cups
ingredients.name: medium zucchini
ingredients.fullName: 5 medium zucchini (washed, cut in half and ends trimmed, about 5 cups)

ingredients.prep: hot or mild, depending on preference
ingredients.name: ground Italian sausage
ingredients.fullName: 3/4 pound ground Italian sausage (hot or mild, depending on preference)

ingredients.name: white navy beans
ingredients.fullName: 2 cans white navy beans (drained and rinsed)

instructions: Attach Vegetable Sheet Cutter Attachment to your KitchenAid® Stand Mixer. Insert the food holder and zucchini/cucumber adapter in the center of both ends of zucchini, aligning the red marks. Secure zucchini and food holder onto attachment. Insert food skewer through zucchini/cucumber adapter and all the way through zucchini. Attach noodle blade, allowing the plastic guard to rest over the zucchini. Place medium bowl under blade to catch zucchini noodles. Turn Stand Mixer to Speed 2 and position blade against zucchini to process. Repeat with remaining zucchini. Remove excess skins from the bowl (if desired), then trim the zucchini noodles to desired length (we recommend about 8”-12” for this dish), and set aside.

Heat a 12” skillet on medium high heat, and brown the Italian sausage about 4-5 minutes - being sure to break the sausage into small bits while browning. Add in minced garlic, and continue to saute.  When almost completely cooked through (and a bit of pink is remaining), add the beans, chopped kale, wine, salt and pepper, and broth, then stir to fully incorporate. Reduce heat to medium and allow to simmer, uncovered, for 3-4 minutes, while stirring.

Add in the zucchini noodles and, using tongs, gently toss to fully incorporate (the same way you would with regular pasta noodles). Add broth, cover and allow noodles to soften for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Turn off heat, add in the grated parmesan and gently toss with tongs to fully incorporate and create a creamy sauce. Serve with a sprinkle of additional parmesan cheese, and a bit of red pepper (if desired). (NOTE: If more creaminess is desired, add a dash of white wine or more broth.)

name: Carrot Quinoa Veggie Wrap

ingredients.name: R.W. Knudsen Family® Organic Carrot Juice Blend
ingredients.fullName: 1 1/3 cups R.W. Knudsen Family® Organic Carrot Juice Blend

instructions: COMBINE carrot juice, garlic, salt and pepper in medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat.

STIR in quinoa. Cover and simmer over low heat 15 minutes or until quinoa is tender and liquid is absorbed. Remove from heat. Let stand, covered, 5 minutes. Serve immediately or cool and store, covered, in refrigerator to use in Veggie Wrap.
For Veggie Wrap: SPREAD hummus on one side of tortilla. Spoon quinoa in a strip down center of tortilla. Top with cucumber, avocado, radish and salad greens. Roll up tightly to enclose fillings.

name: Amarante Rockets or Almond Rolls
instructions: Boil the sugar with a little bit of water, stirring constantly to thicken, until it reaches the hard-ball stage. At this point, the syrup will form thick, "ropey" threads as it drips from the spoon.
Add the almond flour, and cook until thickened.
Remove from heat, and cool completely.
Add the eggs, stir well, and put back on low heat, stirring constantly, to cook the eggs.
Cut the wafer sheet into 6 centimeter squares, and with a cloth soaked in cold water, moisten each one individually.
Fill each one with the almond mixture, and roll up into a cigar shape.
Sprinkle with powdered sugar.
Serve.

name: Ricotta Cheese and Chocolate Swirl Squares

ingredients.name: vanilla bean seeds
ingredients.fullName: 1/4 vanilla bean seeds (scraped and set aside)

instructions: Preheat the oven to 170C.
Beat the eggs with the sugar for 3 minutes with an electric mixer.
Incorporate the ricotta cheese completely, add the vanilla seeds and the flour and continue mixing.
Butter a square cake pan measuring approximately 20 x 20 centimeters and then coat it with the breadcrumbs, eliminate any excess.
Pour 2/3 of the mixture into the cake pan and add the cocoa to the remaining mixture, stirring well.
Pour the chocolate mixture on top of the plain mixture and use a fork to make the swirls in the two mixtures.
Bake for approximately 30 minutes.
Remove the pan from the oven, let cool completely, cut into squares and serve sprinkled with powdered sugar.

name: Dukan Tofu Breadsticks
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Blend the egg with tofu, yeast, a pinch of salt and rosemary. Mix until a dough forms.
Divide the dough into two parts. Add the pizza flavoring to one of the doughs and bacon flavoring to the other.
Place the dough in rectangular baking pans, lined with parchment paper.
Bake for approximately 20 minutes or until the dough is firm.
Remove the pans from the oven and cut into breadsticks approximately 1 centimeter wide.
Return to the oven with the broil function for approximately 10 minutes until the breadsticks are golden and crunchy.

name: Orange and Cardamom Cake
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Beat the butter with the sugar very well.
Add the orange zest and juice, stir to combine.
Add the flour with the baking powder and the cardamom. Mix well.
Whisk the egg whites until stiff and mix into the batter without beating.
Pour batter into a greased bundt cake pan, and bake for 40 to 45 minutes, or until done (toothpick test).

name: Rump Steak with Chips and Poached Egg
instructions: Cut the potatoes into slices with a mandoline or other manual grater.
Wash and dry all the slices well with paper towels, or a kitchen towel.
Sprinkle with paprika powder, and stir so that all the slices are covered.
Fry the potatoes in hot olive oil (take note that it splashes more than cooking oil, and the temperature should be lower than cooking oil), and drain on paper towels.
While potatoes are still warm, sprinkle with dried parsley and salt.
While frying the potatoes, turn on the oven to broil.
Season the steaks with salt, ground pepper, unpeeled pressed garlic, and grease lightly with olive oil on both sides.
Broil until the steaks are branded by the grill (over cooked makes the meat tough).

Heat a small saucepan with water.  When water begins to boil, add a little vinegar, and with a spoon swirl the water in a clockwise direction to make a kind of whirlwind.  Add the eggs (one at a time), and cook for 4 minutes.
Serve hot and garnish with lemon wedges

name: Chocolate Pie with Hazelnuts

ingredients.prep: good quality black, cut into pieces
ingredients.name: grams chocolate
ingredients.fullName: 200 grams chocolate (good quality black, cut into pieces)

instructions: Place the hazelnuts in the blender glass and mash for 10 sec. / Vel. 9.
Add the remaining ingredients and turn to 30 sec. / Vel. 5.
Remove from the cup, cover with cling film and let the dough rest for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Stretch the dough and line the pie tin.
Prick with a fork.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes.
Place the chocolate in the blender glass and turn to 6 sec. / Vel. 8.
Add the cream and program 6min./90º Vel. 2.
Finally add the egg yolks and sugar and stir for 1 min. / Vel. 3.
Pour in the pie tin and put it in the oven again, now at 120 º for 30-35 minutes.
Allow to cool down before serving, if you can of course.

name: Chocolate Cupcakes
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (approximately 425°F).
Melt chocolate and margarine in a double boiler or in the microwave and mix well.
Add cocoa powder, flour and condensed milk.
Whisk to combine.
Mix in eggs and stir very well.
Distribute batter evenly in greased and floured muffin tin.
Bake in preheated oven for 6-7 minutes for moist cupcake or bake for a few additional minutes for well-done cupcake, if desired.
Sprinkle with powdered sugar.
For the chocolate hearts, break chocolate into small pieces and place inside a plastic bag.
Place bag inside a bowl full of very hot water, so chocolate melts inside the bag.
With scissors, cut the tip of the bag and pipe hearts onto parchment paper.
Refrigerate briefly so that chocolate sets.
Remove chocolate from fridge, so that white spots do not develop.
Decorate cupcakes with hearts.

name: Seafood Paella

ingredients.prep: or small lobster or whole crawfish
ingredients.name: grams langoustines
ingredients.fullName: 400 grams langoustines (or small lobster or whole crawfish)

instructions: In a large, wide skillet, saute the langoustines, jumbo shrimp, medium shrimp, squid, and mussels in a little oil. Remove from heat and set aside.
Now saute all the chicken. Remove from heat and set aside also.
Now add the garlic, bell peppers, and onion to the same skillet.
After 5 minutes, add the tomato.
Add the rice, saffron, and water and stir well.
When this mixture begins to boil, stir back in the langoustine, shrimp, squid, and chicken. Salt to taste.
Let the rice cook through and let sit a bit before serving. Decorate with the mussels.

name: Pork Kebab Dog with Spicy Pickle Relish

ingredients.name: kosher salt
ingredients.fullName: 1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt (plus more for seasoning)

ingredients.name: red bell pepper
ingredients.fullName: 1 red bell pepper (small, diced, about 1/2 cup)

instructions: Make the Spicy Relish: In a saucepot, combine the vinegar, water, sugar, salt, mustard seed and coriander. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and cook, stirring occasionally, until it has reduced by half, about 20 minutes. Add in the remaining ingredients for the relish and continue to boil the mixture until the vegetables have softened and the liquid has reduced to a syrupy glaze, 6 to 8 minutes more. Set the relish aside to cool completely.

Next, make the Kebab Dogs: In a large mixing bowl, mix together the ground pork, mint, cumin, coriander, allspice, 1 1/2 teaspoons of salt, and ground pepper. Divide the pork mixture into 4parts and form each part into a tube about 7 inches long and 1 inch wide. Place a long wooden skewer (pre-soak skewers in water if wood or bamboo and using a grill), lengthwise, through the center of each kebab.

Heat a grill pan or grill to medium-high heat, coat each kebab with canola oil on all sides and place on the hot grill to cook, untouched, for 3 to 4 minutes. Then turn the kebabs and continue to cook, until it reaches an internal temperature of 160 degrees F. and is cooked through, about 3 to 4 minutes more.
Allow the cooked kebab dogs to rest for 5 minutes. Remove the skewers from each kebab and serve in the buns, topped with a couple tablespoons of spicy relish.

name: Cream of Cauliflower with a Touch of Cumin
instructions: Cut the cauliflower, potato, onion, and leek into small pieces and boil for half an hour covered with water or a light broth.
When done, add salt and pepper to taste, a little oil, a little milk, and a pinch of cumin. Beat well to mix all the ingredients and obtain a cream.
You can also add some lightly fried ham and a few drops of spicy oil (optional).

name: Tropical Frozen Yogurt
instructions: Mix all of the ingredients in a food processor.
Pour the liquefied mixture into an ice tray and place it in the freezer for approximately 4 hours.
Place the frozen cubes into the food processor again and blend until a thick and creamy consistency is attained.

name: The Big Potato

ingredients.name: Hillshire Farm® Beef Smoked Sausage
ingredients.fullName: 1 package Hillshire Farm® Beef Smoked Sausage

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.  Cut sausage into ½" cubes.  Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat; add sausage, green pepper and onion.  Cook, stirring occasionally 5-6 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

Slice potatoes in half lengthwise.  Scoop potato out of each half, leaving a ¼" thick shell.  Combine potato pulp, sour cream, milk, salt and black pepper in large bowl, mashing until smooth.  Stir in sausage mixture, cheese and chives.  Spoon mashed potato mixture into potato shells.
Place filled potato shells on large baking pan.  Bake 30 minutes or until tops are lightly browned and filling is hot.

name: Cantaloupe Soup with Raspberries and Floc de Gascogne
instructions: Cut the cantaloupe in half, remove the seeds.
Using a melon baller, make 12 melon balls. Refrigerate.
Cut the remaining cantaloupe into small pieces, and blend with honey.
Add Floc of Gascogne and 2 pinches of cinnamon.  Blend long enough to obtain a soupy consistency.
Pour the soup in 4 bowls, add 3 melon balls to each bowl. Divide the raspberries between the bowls, garnish with fresh mint leaves.
You can prepare this dessert in advance, remixing just before serving.
You can serve this dessert with a glass of "Floc de Gascogne".

name: Lamb Shank Confit with Raisins and Creamy Polenta
instructions: Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius
In a dutch oven over medium heat, brown the lamb shanks on every side.
Season with salt and pepper and add broth, honey and a bit of thyme. Mix well.
Transfer the pot to the oven and bake for 2 hours.
Occasionally, baste the meat with its juices.
Lower the oven temperature to 160 C, and bake for another 30 minutes.
Lower the oven temperature to 140 C and add the raisins and bake for another 30 minutes, basting the lamb shanks ocassionaly.
In a large saucepan combine water with salt and bring to a boil.
Add polenta and stir.
Lower the heat and cover. Stir every 4-5 minutes, scraping sides and bottom.
Cook for 30-35 minutes. Remove from heat and add Parmesan cheese.
To serve, place the polenta on a plate, top with a lamb shank and raisin sauce.

name: Kung Pao Chicken

ingredients.prep: boneless, skinless, chicken thigh, cut into 1 to 1 1/2-inch cubes
ingredients.name: ounds meat
ingredients.fullName: 1 1/2 pounds meat (boneless, skinless, chicken thigh, cut into 1 to 1 1/2-inch cubes)

ingredients.prep: ; 2 tablespoons will make this very spicy
ingredients.name: Korean hot pepper paste
ingredients.fullName: 2 tablespoons Korean hot pepper paste (; 2 tablespoons will make this very spicy)

ingredients.name: reen bell pepper
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 green bell pepper (chopped into 3/4 inch pieces)

ingredients.name: ed bell pepper
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 red bell pepper (chopped into 3/4 inch pieces)

ingredients.name: roasted peanuts
ingredients.fullName: 1/3 cup roasted peanuts (unsalted dry-, for garnish)

instructions: First, you need to marinate your chicken. Using a small bowl, stir together the soy sauce, rice wine, sugar, sesame oil and cornstarch until the cornstarch is dissolved. Place the chicken in one layer in your KitchenAid® Ceramic Nesting Casserole dish and pour the soy sauce mixture evenly over the chicken. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight for best results, flipping the chicken just once halfway through.*

When ready to cook, leave the chicken on your kitchen counter and start making the sauce. Using another small mixing bowl, combine the balsamic vinegar, soy sauce, gochujang, hoisin sauce, sesame oil, honey, cornstarch, and Sichuan pepper. Stir together and taste, adjusting any ingredients as needed. Set aside.

Using your KitchenAid® 7-Ply Stainless Steel with Copper Core 10″ Skillet over medium-high heat, heat the vegetable oil and after a minute or two, add in the dried chilies and stir-fry for about 1 to 2 minutes, or until the oil starts to become slightly fragrant. Add the marinated chicken and stir-fry until no longer pink, for about 3 to 5 minutes.

Next, add the scallions, bell peppers, garlic, and ginger. Mix together and stir fry for about 2 to 3 minutes. Pour in the sauce and toss together to coat. Let your Kung Pao Chicken cook for another 3 to 4 minutes, or until the chicken is completely cooked through and is no longer pink. Sprinkle on and mix in the peanuts and cook for another 1 to 2 minutes. Transfer to a serving plate, garnish with more scallions and peanuts if desired and serve with rice and enjoy!

name: Newburg Seafood Pots

ingredients.name: uncook medium shrimp, peel and devein
ingredients.fullName: 1 pound uncook medium shrimp, peel and devein

ingredients.name: I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Spread
ingredients.fullName: 3 tablespoons I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Spread

instructions: Prepare biscuits according to package directions; set aside.
Meanwhile, in medium bowl, toss shrimp with sherry and season, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper; let stand 10 minutes.
In 12-inch nonstick skillet, melt 1 tablespoon Spread over medium-high heat and cook shrimp, stirring occasionally, 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Remove shrimp from skillet and set aside.

In same skillet, melt remaining 2 tablespoons Spread over medium-high heat and cook mushrooms and onion, stirring occasionally, 4 minutes or until vegetables are tender.Stir in Knorr® Newburg sauce mix blended with milk and water. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring constantly. Return shrimp to skillet and heat through. To serve, pour shrimp mixture over biscuits.

name: Skillet Ragout with Potato Dumplings

ingredients.name: reen bell pepper
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 green bell pepper (medium, cut into 3/4-inch squares)

ingredients.prep: instant, and herb mashed potato mix
ingredients.name: butter
ingredients.fullName: 3.8 ounces butter (instant, and herb mashed potato mix)

instructions: In a large skillet, brown pork cubes in hot oil; drain. Stir in pork gravy, vinegar, steak sauce, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and cayenne; mix well. Add mushrooms, celery, onions, green pepper and beans, simmer, covered, for 20 minutes.

Prepare mashed potato mix according to package directions. Remove from heat, quickly stir in beaten egg. Place in mounds on top of boiling meat mixture; cover tightly and cook 5 minutes. Sprinkle with pecans.

name: Pork Chops With Red Tomato Rice

ingredients.name: jar ragu old world style pasta sauce
ingredients.fullName: 1 jar ragu old world style pasta sauce

instructions: Combine 1 tablespoon oil with 1 tablespoon Knorr® Chicken flavor Bouillon in small bowl; brush onto chops.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in deep 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and brown chops, turning once, about 12 minutes. Remove chops and set aside. Drain skillet.

Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in same skillet and cook poblano peppers and onion, stirring occasionally, 2 minutes. Stir in rice and remaining 1 tablespoon Bouillon and cook 1 minute. Stir in water and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer covered 12 minutes. Stir in Pasta Sauce, then return chops to skillet. Cook covered 12 minutes or until pork is done and rice is tender. Arrange chops on serving platter, then garnish with cilantro.

name: Sweet Potato Apple and Ginger Soup

ingredients.name: fresh ginger
ingredients.fullName: 3 teaspoons fresh ginger (peeled, cut into small pieces)

ingredients.name: grams sweet potato
ingredients.fullName: 450 grams sweet potato (peeled, cut into pieces)

instructions: In a skillet, saute the onion with the olive oil for 5 minutes, add ginger (2 teaspoons) and  sweet potato, cook and stir for 6/8 minutes .
Add 1 apple cut into pieces . Cook for 2/3 minutes.
Add the chicken stock, a small bunch of cilantro.  Season with salt and pepper.
Cook - covered - for 15/20 minutes, until vegetables are tender.
Mix in the blender, gradually adding the broth to reach the desired consistency.
Check the seasoning.
Return to the stove, cook over low heat, the soup should not boil.
In a skillet, melt 15g of butter and sauté the 2nd apple cut into pieces and 2 teaspoons of ginger, sprinkle with sugar and cook for 3/4 minutes until caramelized.
To serve, pour the soup into bowls,  in the center top with caramelized apples and ginger, a few drops of sour cream and cilantro leaves .

name: Hazelnut Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit. Grease and flour a cake pan.
In a bowl beat the eggs with the sugar and vanilla sugar until you get a frothy mixture.
Add the milk and oil while mixing.
In a different bowl, mix the flour, yeast, and ground hazelnuts. Add to the wet ingredients.
Mix everything to get a smooth batter.
Fill the prepared cake pan with the mixture.
Bake for 40 minutes at 400 F.
Feel free to dust with powdered sugar once unmolded.

name: Semita Sweet Piloncillo Rolls

ingredients.prep: or 1 1/3 cups dark brown sugar and 1 1/3 tbsps. molasses
ingredients.name: grams piloncillo
ingredients.fullName: 330 grams piloncillo (or 1 1/3 cups dark brown sugar and 1 1/3 tbsps. molasses)

instructions: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
In a bowl, add the flour, piloncillo, baking powder, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt. Stir.
Add lard, eggs, and milk. Mix with a wooden spoon.
Pour the dough onto a flat surface and knead. Add flour as needed.
Separate into portions and shape the semitas into small 1-centimeter-thick patties.
Place on a baking tray.
Bake for 20 to 30 minutes, until the bottoms are golden brown.

name: Pepperoni, Mushroom & Sausage Frittata

ingredients.name: California Pizza Kitchen Uncured Pepperoni, Mushroom & Sausage Cauliflower Pizza
ingredients.fullName: California Pizza Kitchen Uncured Pepperoni, Mushroom & Sausage Cauliflower Pizza

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F
While the oven heats, prep the vegetables and set aside, then crack the eggs in a small dish and whisk with salt and pepper, set aside
Place the pizza in the oven and cook as directed
Heat the olive oil in a cast iron skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat
Add the onion, garlic, and pepper and sauté for about 5 minutes, or until the onion is translucent.
Add the kale and water to the skillet and sauté until the kale is wilted, about 3 minutes
Remove the pizza from the oven and cool, reduce oven temperature to 350. Slice the pizza into 2” squares and layer into the skillet.
Whisk the eggs in a bowl. Pour the eggs and cheese over the pizza in the skillet and place in the oven for 20 minutes.
Serve hot

name: Vanilla Roasted Pears with Cranberries

ingredients.prep: firm-ripe, large, Bosc or another variety
ingredients.name: pears
ingredients.fullName: 8 pears (firm-ripe, large, Bosc or another variety)

ingredients.prep: fresh or frozen, 10-12 oz. per bag
ingredients.name: bag cranberries
ingredients.fullName: 1 bag cranberries (fresh or frozen, 10-12 oz. per bag)

instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Use a melon baller to make a hole in the bottom of each pear, then dig deeper to scoop out core. Peel pears and cut a thin slice off the bottoms so they stand flat.
Use the tip of a paring knife to split the vanilla bean in half lengthwise, then run the back of the knife along each half to scrape out the vanilla seeds. Set the seeds and scraped pod aside.

Melt butter in a large ovenproof frying pan over medium-high heat. Add sugar and the vanilla seeds and pod and cook, stirring occasionally, until sugar melts and liquid is medium amber in color, about 5 minutes.
Carefully add wine to pan, stirring until incorporated. Add pears, laying them on their sides, and cook, turning pears occasionally, until pears are almost tender, 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat.
Be careful when adding the wine—the mixture will bubble and spurt, so add it a little at a time.
Stand pears upright in the pot and add cranberries, nestling them into the liquid.

Transfer the pan to the oven and bake pears on middle rack, basting occasionally and gently moving cranberries around, until pears are very tender when pierced with a paring knife and most of the cranberries have burst, 20-25 minutes.
Check to see that pears and cranberries are done. Remove from oven or add time as needed.
Cool pears in frying pan about 10 minutes, basting occasionally. Remove vanilla pods. Serve warm, at room temperature, or chilled.

name: Soft Fish Tacos With Jicama-mango Salad
instructions: Toss mango, jicama, 1 tablespoon lime juice and 1 tablespoon cilantro in medium bowl; set aside.

Season cod with remaining 1 tablespoon lime juice, chili powder and garlic. Melt Promise® Buttery Spread in 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat and cook cod, stirring occasionally, 4 minutes or until cod flakes with a fork.
Spoon cod into tortillas, then sprinkle with remaining cilantro. Serve with jicama-mango salad.

name: Creamy Fish Stew
instructions: Heat olive oil in deep 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium heat and cook onion, carrot and celery, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are crisp-tender, about 6 minutes. Stir in garlic and red pepper flakes and cook 30 seconds. Stir in wine and cook until almost evaporated, about 1 minute. Stir in Sauce. Bring to a boil. Stir in potatoes and boil gently covered until potatoes are almost tender, about 12 minutes.
Add cod to skillet, then spoon over sauce. Simmer covered 8 minutes until cod flakes with a fork, about 8 minutes. Garnish with lemon wedges.

name: Chocolate Squares With Chocolate Ganache

ingredients.name: powdered sugar
ingredients.fullName: powdered sugar (to taste and for sprinkling)

instructions: Whisk the egg yolks with butter and sugar until creamy.
Add chocolate and stir to combine.
Add the sifted flour, stir with a spoon. Do not over mix.
Whisk the egg whites and carefully into batter.
Pour batter into a 23 cm square pan greased and lined with parchment paper.
Bake in a 350°F oven for 25-30 minutes.
Allow to cool slightly and unmold.
For the ganache: Heat the cream. Do not boil. Add the chocolate broken into small pieces. Stir until chocolate melts completely.
Remove from heat and stir until cooled.
Cover the cake with the ganache. Cut into squares, sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve with a scoop of ice cream or berries.

name: Carne con Chili Stew
instructions: Roast the tomatoes, tomatillos, and arbol chili.
In the pressure cooker, heat the oil. Sear the meat and season with salt.
In the blender, crush the tomatoes, tomatillos, chili, and garlic. Do not puree, as the texture should be chunky.
Pour the sauce into the pressure cooker. Season with salt if needed. Close the lid and cook for 30 to 40 minutes from the time it boils.
Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable and Shrimp Pasta with Garlic

ingredients.prep: Guindilla, may substitute red pepper flakes
ingredients.name: pepper flakes
ingredients.fullName: pepper flakes (Guindilla, may substitute red pepper flakes)

instructions: Saute the onion, pepper, and eggplant in a large oven-safe pan until soft. Add the zucchini. Let cook a few moments before adding the tomato. Remove from heat once the tomato is cooked.
Peel the shrimp and place the peels into a saucepan. Cover with water, add 2 cloves of garlic and parsley. Drain and keep on warm heat.
Saute 2 cloves of garlic in a skillet, add the noodles and saute until golden. Drain to remove excess oil.
Add the noodles to the vegetables and add the broth from the shrimp to cover. Allow to come to a boil and place into a hot oven for 7 minutes.
Saute the shrimp with 2 cloves of garlic and the pepper flakes. Add to the pasta. Serve with aioli sauce.

name: Pasta with Chipotle Beef

ingredients.prep: chipotle, pickled or previously soaked in water for one hour
ingredients.name: chili pepper
ingredients.fullName: 1 chili pepper (chipotle, pickled or previously soaked in water for one hour)

instructions: Place a pot on the stove, add the oil, onion, and garlic, and fry everything over low to medium heat. Cook until the onion becomes transparent.
While the onion and garlic are frying, place the chili pepper and tomato in the blender and liquefy.
Pour the sauce from the blender into the pot, mix it together with the meat and cover the pot. Let everything cook for 15 minutes.
Cook the pasta according to the instructions listed on its package. Once the pasta is ready, add it into the pot and mix it with the sauce.
Place the pasta into an oven-safe tray or pan, cover the top of the pasta with a layer of cheese and place it in the oven for a few minutes or until the cheese begins to melt.

name: Sausage and Apple Crepes

ingredients.name: Jimmy Dean® Premium Pork Regular Sausage
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 package Jimmy Dean® Premium Pork Regular Sausage

ingredients.prep: medium, peeled, cored, thinly sliced, 2 cups
ingredients.name: tart baking apples
ingredients.fullName: 2 tart baking apples (medium, peeled, cored, thinly sliced, 2 cups)

instructions: Melt butter in large skillet over MEDIUM heat. Stir in brown sugar and cinnamon. Add apples; stir. Cook 5-7 minutes or until apples are slightly softened and sugar is dissolved, stirring frequently. Remove from heat; stir in sausage.
Mix cream cheese and 1 tablespoon powdered sugar until well blended.
Spread cream cheese mixture down centers of crepes; top with apples. Roll up. Sprinkle with remaining 1 tablespoon powdered sugar. Serve warm.

name: Olive Fougasse

ingredients.prep: tepid, this is an approximation, do not add all but add if necessary
ingredients.name: milliliters water
ingredients.fullName: 250 milliliters water (tepid, this is an approximation, do not add all but add a little if necessary)

instructions: In a bowl, form a volcano with the flour and in the center add the other ingredients. Knead until pastry becomes elastic. Mold into a ball and let stand for 1 hour.

Next, divide pastry into four equal pieces. Flatten with a rolling pin and place on a floured baking tray or on a baking mat. Make cuts as seen in the picture, which are Fougasse characteristics. Let stand half an hour.
Preheat oven to 220 degrees Celsius.
Before putting into the oven, brush the Fougasse with olive oil. Bake for 20 minutes.
Turn off the oven and let rest inside the oven for five more minutes. Then remove and let cool completely on a rack.

name: Spiced Pear Jam
instructions: Peel the pears. Quarter them and remove the core and seeds. Cut into cubes, place in a large saucepan or Dutch oven, add the sugar, lemon juice, and spices. Cook for about 40 minutes until jam is thick.
To verify that your jam is ready, put a drop on a plate and it should congeal.
Boil the jam jars and pour hot jam in each of them. Close the jars, turn upside down for 20 minutes.

name: Georgia Peach Pie
instructions: PREPARE recipe for double crust pie, using a 10-inch pie plate. Roll out dough for bottom crust and place in pie plate according to recipe directions. Do not bake.
HEAT oven to 400ºF.
DRAIN peaches, reserving 3 tablespoons syrup; set aside. Cut peaches into chunks. Place in large bowl.
COMBINE cornstarch and 3 tablespoons sugar in small bowl; add reserved peach syrup, remaining sugar, eggs and buttermilk. Mix well.
STIR in melted butter and vanilla; pour mixture over peaches. Stir until peaches are coated. Pour filling into unbaked pie crust. Moisten pastry edge with water.
ROLL out dough for top crust, place onto filled pie and finish edges according to pie crust recipe directions. Cut slits or design in top crust or prick with fork to vent steam.
BRUSH crust with melted butter. Sprinkle with sugar.
BAKE 30 to 40 minutes or until filling in center is bubbly and crust is golden brown. Cool to room temperature before serving.

name: White Chocolate Panna-Cotta with Passionfruit Coulis and Pineapple Skewers
instructions: Dissolve the gelatin in a container with cold water to soften.
In a saucepan heat the cream and milk and bring to a boil.
Remove from heat and add the white chocolate, wait for 2 minutes before gently stirring the mixture.
Add the gelatin and stir until well dissolved.
Pour into dessert glasses and let  cool before storing in the fridge.
Let set in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours, preferably overnight.
Cut the passion fruit in two, collect the juice and seeds in a bowl.
Add 1 teaspoon of sugar.
Microwave for 30 seconds.
Let it cool for 2 minutes and add to the panna cottas when they are set.
Cut the pineapple into small cubes.
Melt butter in a frying pan, saute the diced pineapple then add the sugar to caramelize them over low heat.
Assemble skewers with 3 to 4 pineapple cubes.
Insert the pineapple skewers on the panna cotta.

name: Pumpkin Cupcakes with Orange Cream Cheese Frosting

ingredients.name: Spice Islands Ground Saigon Cinnamon
ingredients.fullName: 2 teaspoons Spice Islands Ground Saigon Cinnamon

instructions: Blend the eggs, oil, sugar, and pumpkin in a large mixing bowl; set aside. Stir together dry ingredients in a separate bowl.
Add dry ingredients to pumpkin mixture and beat until well blended.
Pour into lined muffin tins.
Fill about 2/3 full.
Bake in preheated 350°oven for 30 minutes or until center springs back when touched.
Cool 30 minutes.
Spread with Orange Cream Cheese Frosting.

name: Lumaconi Pasta Stuffed with Ground Beef
instructions: For the pasta: In a saucepan with olive oil, sauté the onion, the chopped garlic, and the bay leaf.
Add the meat and cook on medium heat.
Season with salt and pepper and set aside.
Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil, add a little salt and a little olive oil and cook the pasta until al dente.
Drain and let cool slightly.
Carefully stuff the pasta with meat mixture, and place the noodles in a glass baking dish.
Preheat oven to 400°F.
For the sauce: Dice the peeled and seedless tomatoes and sauté in olive oil.
Add the oregano, tomato paste, sugar, red wine vinegar and salt, and cook until the tomato has almost disintegrated.
If necessary, add a few tablespoons of water.
If you prefer a smoother sauce, you can coarsely grind the sauce with a hand blender.
Pour the sauce on the pasta and sprinkle with grated cheese.
Bake for about 15 minutes, or until the cheese has melted.
Serve and garnish with fresh or dried chopped parsley.

name: Cider and Cinnamon Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
In a bowl, mix the flour and baking powder.
In another bowl, mix the butter and sugar to a pale cream. Mix in the eggs, 110 grams of the flour mixture, and the cinnamon.
Gradually, mix in the cider and the remaining flour mixture.
Butter and flour a round cake pan.
Pour the batter in the pan.
Bake for 40 minutes.

name: Sourdough Onion Rings
instructions: Cut the onions into thin slices, approximately 2 to 3 millimeters wide. Separate the slices into rings, discarding the small ones in the center.
Heat the oil to 185 degrees Celsius.
Combine the sourdough starter with the water and salt in a large bowl. Mix together with a fork.
Dip the onion rings into the batter and fry in small batches. Fry for approximately 1 minute on each side, until golden.
Remove from oil and place onto a paper towel to remove any excess oil.

name: Fajitas de Puerco
instructions: Butterfly the pork loin by cutting down the length of the loin about halfway, starting at the thick end. Flatten it so that it is of even length of the loin about halfway, starting at the thick end. Mix chili powder, garlic powder, salt and pepper and massage into the meat on both sides. Put it into a plastic bag and let it marinate.
Grill the pork tenderloin over a hot grill, about 5-7 minutes per side, or until internal temperature reaches 145 degrees F., brushing with the melted hot pepper jelly on each side to glaze.
Remove to cutting board, allow to rest 5 minutes before slicing on the diagonal into thin slices and place slices onto a warm platter. Squeeze oranges over the sliced meat, sprinkle with cilantro.
Serving suggestions: Serve immediately with warm flour tortillas and pico de gallo made with mango, avocado, red onion, jalapeno and garlic or peach salsa.

name: Horseradish-Mustard New Potatoes
instructions: Scrub potatoes; cut in halves or quarters. In a covered Dutch oven, cook potatoes in a small amount of boiling, lightly salted water about 10 minutes or until tender. Drain and return to pan. In medium saucepan, sauté onion in butter for 4-5 minutes or until tender. Stir in 1 tablespoon of flour and salt. Add chicken broth. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. In a small bowl, stir together sour cream, horseradish, mustard and remaining 1 tablespoon flour. Stir into broth mixture. Cook and stir until heated through. Pour sauce over potatoes; toss lightly to coat. Transfer to a serving bowl. Sprinkle with chives and cracked peppercorns.

name: Margarita Pork Heroes

ingredients.prep: from Margarita Pork Roast recipe linked in the description, thinly sliced
ingredients.name: pork roast
ingredients.fullName: pork roast (from Margarita Pork Roast recipe linked in the description, thinly sliced)

instructions: *Use leftover Margarita Pork Roast: https://www.yummly.com/recipe/Margarita-Pork-Roast-2248413

To serve cold: Arrange sliced pork, cheese and tomatoes attractively on serving platter; garnish. Arrange sandwich buns in napkin-lined basket. Place Roasted Garlic Mayonnaise (see below for instructions) in small serving bowl.

To serve warm: Heat broiler. Top bottoms of buns with pork and cheese; broil to melt cheese. Remove from broiler and top with tomatoes and tops of sandwich buns; serve with Roasted Garlic Mayonnaise (instructions follow).

Roasted Garlic Mayonnaise: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Carefully slice about 1/2 inch off the top of whole garlic bulb, exposing cloves. Place on 8-inch square of aluminum foil; drizzle with a little olive oil and seal package. Roast for 30-45 minutes, until garlic is soft. Squeeze garlic from cloves to stir into mayonnaise; season to taste with hot pepper sauce. Makes 2 cups, about 16 servings.

name: Pork With Chiles and Lime

ingredients.prep: or Boneless Pork Loin, Cut Into 1-inch Cubes
ingredients.name: ounds boneless pork shoulder
ingredients.fullName: 2 pounds boneless pork shoulder (or Boneless Pork Loin, Cut Into 1-inch Cubes)

instructions: Season pork cubes with salt and pepper. Heat oil in large Dutch oven and sauté pork in batches until nicely browned on all sides, about 5 minutes. Transfer pork to a plate. Stir in onion, chiles and garlic and cook, stirring, for 2 to 3 minutes, until onion is soft. Add pork back in along with broth, cilantro, zest and juice. Bring to a boil. Simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, for about 1 1/4 hours, until meat is fork-tender and liquid has thickened.
Serve garnished with lime wedges and chopped cilantro with warm tortillas and black beans on the side.

name: Trisha’s Mexican Taco Stuffed Peppers

ingredients.prep: Jimmy Dean® Regular Flavor Pork Sausage
ingredients.name: roll
ingredients.fullName: 1 package roll (Jimmy Dean® Regular Flavor Pork Sausage)

ingredients.prep: medium, cut in half lengthwise and seeded
ingredients.name: bell peppers
ingredients.fullName: 3 bell peppers (medium, cut in half lengthwise and seeded)

instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Cook sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8-10 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, stirring frequently; drain.
2. Stir in taco seasoning mix and amount of water as indicated on taco seasoning package and prepare according to package directions. Stir in 1 cup cheese; mix lightly.

3. Fill pepper halves with sausage mixture and arrange in a 13x9-inch baking dish. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes or until thoroughly cooked and peppers are tender, removing foil in last 5-10 minutes of baking. Top with additional cheese before serving, if desired.

name: Crackers or the story of some Biscuits

ingredients.name: deciliter water
ingredients.fullName: 1 deciliter water (may be replaced with milk)

instructions: Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Grease a pan with a little margarine and sprinkle flour on top. Set aside.

Put all ingredients (except sugar and cinnamon) in a bowl and beat in an electric mixer or food processor. Place in the tray and bake for about 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and cut into pieces.
Mix the cinnamon and sugar in a cup. Place each piece of cake, while still warm, in this mixture and cover completely with the cinnamon and sugar. Serve immediately.

name: Sauteed Chicken & Vegetables Over Spaghetti Squash

ingredients.prep: small, (about 2 1/4 lbs ), halved lengthwise and seeded
ingredients.name: spaghetti squash
ingredients.fullName: 1 spaghetti squash (small, (about 2 1/4 lbs ), halved lengthwise and seeded)

ingredients.name: fresh basil leaves (thinly sliced,
ingredients.fullName: 1 tablespoon fresh basil leaves (thinly sliced, optional)

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves

instructions: Arrange uncovered squash cut side down in 11 x 7-inch baking dish; add water. Microwave uncovered at HIGH 10 minutes or until tender. Let stand 5 minutes. Gently scrape squash with fork to pull apart spaghetti-like strands; discard shallots. Toss squash, 1 tablespoon Promise® Buttery Spread and cheese in medium bowl.
Meanwhile, melt remaining 1 tablespoon Spread in 12-inch skillet and cook chicken, stirring occasionally, 6 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. Remove chicken and keep warm.
Evenly divide squash between 2 dinner plates, then top with chicken mixture. Season, if desired, with freshly ground black pepper.

Add zucchini to same skillet and cook, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in tomatoes and garlic and cook 2 minutes or until tomatoes are starting to break down. Stir in basil. Return chicken to skillet.

name: Vegan Baked Spaghetti

ingredients.name: salt
ingredients.fullName: 3/4 teaspoon salt (plus more for pasta water)

instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F.
Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. Set aside.

Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add a generous pinch of salt. Once boiling, add the spaghetti to the water. Cook for 9-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the pasta is al dente. Drain the pasta in a large colander, and rinse thoroughly with cold water. While the pasta cooks, prepare the tofu ricotta.

Place the tofu, olive oil, lemon juice, nutritional yeast, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning into the bowl of a food processor or blender. Process on high power for 2-3 minutes, until very smooth. Adjust olive oil and seasonings to desired consistency and taste.
Return the drained spaghetti to the large pot. Add 3 cups marinara sauce and stir to thoroughly coat the noodles.

Transfer half of the sauced pasta to the prepared baking dish. Drop the tofu mixture by spoonfuls over the spaghetti, and gently spread it into an even layer. Top with the remaining noodles. Spoon remaining marinara sauce over the dish.
Cover the baking dish with a sheet of aluminum foil.
Bake the spaghetti for 40 minutes on the middle rack of oven.
Remove the aluminum foil and bake for 10 minutes longer, until the dish is heated through.
Check to see that pasta is done. Remove from oven or add time as needed.
Remove the baking dish from the oven. Allow the spaghetti to rest for 20 minutes before serving.

name: Carne Asada Fajitas

ingredients.name: Mexican seasoning
ingredients.fullName: 2 tablespoons Mexican seasoning (McCormick® Perfect Pinch®, divided)

ingredients.prep: large, cut crosswise into 1/4-inch thick slices
ingredients.name: ed onion
ingredients.fullName: 1 red onion (large, cut crosswise into 1/4-inch thick slices)

instructions: Mix vinegar, lime juice, 1 tablespoon of the Seasoning, honey and oil in small bowl until well blended. Set aside. Rub steak with remaining 1 tablespoon Seasoning.
Grill steak and vegetables over medium-high heat 3 to 4 minutes per side or until steak is desired doneness and vegetables are tender. Brush occasionally with 2 tablespoons of the lime juice mixture.
Slice steak across the grain into thin slices. Cut vegetables into thin slices. Spoon steak and vegetables onto warmed tortillas. Drizzle with remaining lime juice mixture.

name: Turkey Pot Pie with Gravy and Cranberry Sauce

ingredients.prep: prepared, breadcrumbs with butter or pie crust, here’s my recipe
ingredients.name: puff pastry
ingredients.fullName: 1 puff pastry (prepared, breadcrumbs with butter or pie crust, here’s my recipe)

ingredients.prep: lightly beaten with 1 teaspoon of water
ingredients.name: egg
ingredients.fullName: 1 egg (lightly beaten with 1 teaspoon of water)

instructions: Preheat the oven to 350 and melt the butter in a saucepan, cook the chopped onion until tender. Stir in celery and carrots and cook for a few minutes, then stir in herbes de provence (optional) and flour, cook for an additional 2 minutes. Add the stock and gravy (optional) and bring to a simmer. Add the potatoes and simmer until tender. Then, stir in the turkey, parsley and peas. Pour mixture into baking dish or 4 ramekins and top with optional stuffing and cranberry sauce.
Top the mixture with puff pastry (or pie crust), with edges hanging over the side and brush with egg wash. Bake for 20-30 minutes, until crust is golden.

name: Fresh Apple Crisp

ingredients.name: Granny Smith apples
ingredients.fullName: 3 Granny Smith apples (large, peeled and sliced)

ingredients.name: Hellmann's or Best Foods Real Mayonnaise
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup Hellmann's or Best Foods Real Mayonnaise

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°.
In large bowl, toss apples with 2 tablespoons sugar. In greased 9-inch pie plate, spoon apple mixture; set aside.

In medium bowl, combine remaining 3/4 cup sugar, flour and cinnamon. Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise. With fingers, gently squeeze flour mixture to form crumbs; evenly sprinkle over apples.
Bake 30 minutes or until lightly browned.  Serve warm.

name: Aunt Gabriella’s Delicious Cake
instructions: Sift the flour with the baking powder and a pinch of salt.
Beat the butter, sugar, and grated lemon peel with an electric mixer until light and foamy.
Add the egg yolks, one at a time, adding each one after the first has been completely incorporated.
Add the flour, alternating with the milk.
Add the stiffly beaten egg whites, folding them into the batter carefully.
Preheat the oven to 170 degrees Celsius.
Butter and flour a 22 to 24 centimeter cake pan.
Place the cake in the oven when it has reached a temperature of 50 to 60 C. Bake for approximately 45 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Remove the cake from the oven and let cool.

name: Crabsticks, Rice, and Vegetable Burgers
instructions: Chop the crab sticks, and sprinkle with lemon juice.
In a bowl, mix the cooked rice with the crab, leek, zucchini, garlic cloves, and parsley. Stir in the slightly beaten egg.
Season with salt, pepper, and add flavor with cumin.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Form small balls, and flatten into burgers.
Place burgers in a baking pan greased with olive oil, sprinkle with a little olive oil, and bake for 25 minutes until toasted.

name: Melon, Mint, and Banana Juice
instructions: In the blender, add all the ingredients, and mix for 2 minutes.
Add more water if necessary to obtain desired consistency.

name: Italian Pork and Vegetable Soup

ingredients.prep: boneless, about 3/4 pound, trimmed and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
ingredients.name: lade pork steak
ingredients.fullName: 1 blade pork steak (boneless, about 3/4 pound, trimmed and cut into 1/2-inch pieces)

instructions: In large saucepan cover pork with 1 cup of water, or enough water to barely cover. Bring to a boil over high heat, cover, lower heat and simmer until pork is cooked through, about 10 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, seasoning, beans, potatoes, mushrooms, carrots, onion, celery and spaghetti. Simmer covered for 20-30 minutes, until vegetables and pasta are tender.
Season to taste with salt and pepper and garnish each serving with 2 tablespoons Parmesan.
Serves 4.

name: Garlicky Chicken Wings
instructions: Preheat oven to 425° F.  Spray a 13" x 9" baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Melt butter with olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat.  Sprinkle chicken with salt and add to skillet.  Cook, turning occasionally for 10 minutes or until browned.
Add garlic, cook and stir 1 minute longer.  Stir in red pepper flakes and mix well.
Transfer chicken mixture to prepared baking pan.  Bake, turning once for 20-25 minutes or until done (internal temp 180° F).

name: Pork And Apple Cheddar Burgers
instructions: Pre-heat a charcoal or gas grill.
Blend the apple, green onion, thyme, salt and pepper together in a medium bowl. Add the ground pork; gently mix until combined. Form into 4 patties, about ¾-inch thick.

Grill over medium hot coals or medium-high on a gas grill, covered for 5 minutes. Turn and grill, covered, an additional 4 to 6 minutes, until an instant-read thermometer registers the internal temperature at 160 degrees F. Cover each burger with a slice of cheddar and serve on buns.
4 servings

These burgers are equally tasty done in the broiler. Place them on a broiler pan and cook as directed above. To pan fry the burgers, cook over medium heat, turning several times, until well browned and 160 degrees F, about 10-12 minutes total time

name: Greek Salad Pizza

ingredients.name: Best Foods Mediterranean Roasted Garlic & Herb Flavored Mayonnaise
ingredients.fullName: 4 1/2 tablespoons Best Foods Mediterranean Roasted Garlic & Herb Flavored Mayonnaise

instructions: Preheat oven to 450°.

Combine 2-1/2 tablespoons Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Mediterranean Roasted Garlic & Herb Flavored Mayonnaise, vinegar and oregano in large bowl. Toss mayonnaise mixture with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, cheese and olives.
Spread remaining 2 tablespoons Mayonnaise on pizza crust. Bake 8 minutes.
Top warm crust with salad and serve immediately.

name: Grilled Eggplants and Peppers with Pine Nuts
instructions: Grill the eggplants and cut them into strips.
Grill the bell peppers whole, peel off their skin and cut them into strips.
Place the strips of eggplants and peppers inside a baking dish, add oil, a few drops of balsamic vinegar, and season with salt.
Add a handful of pine nuts and the chopped basil leaves.
Stir well to combine, let rest for a few hours and serve.

name: Creamy Homestyle Vanilla Frosting

ingredients.prep: OR 2/3 stick Crisco® Baking Sticks All-Vegetable Shortening
ingredients.name: Crisco All-Vegetable Shortening
ingredients.fullName: 2/3 cup Crisco All-Vegetable Shortening (OR 2/3 stick Crisco® Baking Sticks All-Vegetable Shortening)

instructions: DISSOLVE salt in milk.

PLACE shortening, vanilla and milk mixture in medium bowl. Beat with an electric mixer or flat beater of a stand up mixer while gradually adding powdered sugar on low speed. Once all the powdered sugar is incorporated, stop and scrape bowl with spatula.

INCREASE mixer speed; beat until smooth and fluffy, 1 minute or less. If needed, add powdered sugar by the tablespoonful to thicken; or add milk to thin frosting, to achieve desired spreading consistency. Makes 4 cups.

name: Italian-Stuffed Pork Tenderloin

ingredients.prep: long grain and, cooked according to package directions and cooled
ingredients.name: wild rice
ingredients.fullName: 6 ounces wild rice (long grain and, cooked according to package directions and cooled)

ingredients.name: chardonnay
ingredients.fullName: 3 tablespoons chardonnay (OR other dry white wine)

instructions: Heat oven to 425 degrees F. Cut lengthwise slit in each pork tenderloin, cutting to but not through the other side. Set pork aside. Melt butter in large saucepan over medium heat. Add mushrooms and green onions; cook until tender. Remove from heat. Stir in cooked long grain and wild rice mix, pecans and parsley. Set aside 3/4 cup of the rice mixture. Spoon remaining rice mixture into 1 1/2-quart casserole; cover and set aside. Divide 3/4 cup rice mixture between slits in pork tenderloins, spreading evenly in slits. Close slits; secure with toothpicks.
Stir together Italian seasoning and salt in small bowl. Sprinkle evenly over top of pork tenderloins. Place pork tenderloins on rack in shallow roasting pan.

Roast tenderloins, uncovered, for 25-27 minutes until internal temperature is 145 degrees Fahrenheit, followed by a 5-minute rest time. Bake casserole of rice mixture alongside tenderloins. Meanwhile, for sauce, combine Alfredo sauce and Chardonnay in medium saucepan. Cook and stir over low heat until bubbly. To serve, spoon rice mixture onto serving platter. Remove toothpicks from tenderloins. Cut pork tenderloins into 1-inch-thick pieces; arrange on rice mixture on platter. Serve sauce with pork and rice mixture.

name: Pork Chop Salad with Strawberries and Almonds

ingredients.name: boneless ribeye (OR New York pork chops, about 3/4-inch thick)
ingredients.fullName: 1 pound boneless ribeye (rib) pork chops (OR New York pork chops, about 3/4-inch thick)

instructions: In a small skillet over medium heat, toast almonds, stirring occasionally, until browned, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer to a plate and set aside to cool.
While almonds are toasting, in a small bowl, combine oil, vinegar, shallot, honey, and salt and pepper to taste. Set aside.

Prepare a grill to medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate. Season pork with salt and pepper and grill until internal temperature reaches 145 degrees F, about 4 minutes per side. Remove chops from grill and let rest 3 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine almonds, arugula, strawberries, and dressing to taste. Arrange salad on plates.
Thinly slice pork and arrange on top of salads. Drizzle with any remaining dressing and serve.

name: Cranberry & Pecan Crusted Rack of Pork
instructions: 1. Combine juice, vodka and salt, mix well to combine
2. Cover pork with cranberry liquid and Refrigerate overnight
3. Remove from liquid and pat dry, set aside
1. In food processor combine cranberries and little warm water
2. Puree until smooth, set aside
1.  In mixing bowl, combine pecans, bread crumbs and 1 ½ fl oz butter. Mix well to combine, set aside
1. Heat a large sauté pan, add 1 ½ fl oz. clarified butter and sear the rack of pork on both sides
On baking grate, place pork bone side down
2. Evenly spread cranberry paste on pork
3. Evenly top with pecan crust
4. Cover with foil and bake at 325F for approximately 1 1/2 hours or until 140F
5. Remove foil about 10-15 minutes before pork is done to brown the pecan crust
6. Allow pork to rest 15 minutes before service
Carve rack into 8 portions and place on each plate. Arange each plate with wilted garlic spinach and apple tart. Sauce each plate with cranberry pork jus

name: Healthy Biscotti
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180C.
Combine the sugar with the flour, make a well in the center and add the butter, cream of tartar, baking soda, eggs, and vanilla extract. Slowly add enough milk until the dough is soft.
Shape the dough into a loaf approximately 50 centimeters in length and flatten the top.
Grease a baking sheet with butter, cut the loaf in half, and place the two pieces on the baking sheet slightly apart.
Bake for approximately 25 minutes until golden.
Remove them from the oven and let cool completely.
Slice the loaves and place the biscotti (approximately 30 biscotti) on the baking sheet and return them to the oven to be toasted for a few more minutes.
Remove the biscotti from the oven and let them cool completely before serving.

name: Ham and Egg Breakfast Burritos
instructions: Cook red and green bell peppers and onion over medium heat in large nonstick skillet coated with nonstick cooking spray for 3-5 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally.
Beat together egg whites, eggs, milk, salt and black pepper in medium bowl until combined.

Pour egg mixture over vegetables in skillet. Cook over medium heat, without stirring, until egg mixture begins to set on bottom and around edge. Lift and fold the partially cooked egg mixture with spatula so uncooked portion flows underneath. Continue cooking and folding mixture until eggs are cooked through, but still glossy and moist. Fold in ham; continue cooking until heated through, gently folding mixture occasionally.
Remove skillet from heat. To assemble, spoon mixture near the center on each tortilla. Fold bottom up over filling. Fold in side and roll to enclose mixture.
To serve, top with salsa. Garnish with cilantro or chives, if desired.
Makes 4 servings
* To warm tortillas, place tortillas on dinner plate, slightly overlapping. Cover with damp paper towel. Microwave on HIGH about 30 seconds or until warm.
** Learn to become a label detective. When counting calories and fat, tortillas are not all alike. Be sure to flip the package over and compare the nutrition information from different brands.

name: Pear, Vanilla, and Ginger Cake
instructions: To prepare the pears, place the water, the sugar, and the Marsala wine in a large saucepan, bring the mixture to a boil, stirring until the sugar has dissolved.
Cut off the bottom of each pear so that it can stand on its own and eliminate the seeds.
Place the pears in the saucepan and bring the mixture to a boil.
Reduce the heat to medium, stirring occasionally, until the pears are done, approximately 10 minutes.
Remove the pears from the saucepan and place them on a plate.
To prepare the batter, preheat the oven to 165C.
Use a mixer to beat the butter with the sugar for approximately 5 minutes.
Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Add the seeds from the vanilla bean and the ground ginger.
Sift the flour with the baking powder and add it to the batter.
Add the milk, mixing for a few more minutes.
Butter and flour an 18 centimeter cake pan, or line it with wax paper and pour the batter inside.
Add the pears to the cake pan by inserting them carefully into the batter, all the way to the bottom.
Bake for approximately 1 hour and 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Remove the cake from the oven, let it cool and sprinkle with powdered sugar before serving.

name: Spiced Pumpkin Doughnuts
instructions: Put flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and ginger in a high-powered blender. Pulse to blend ingredients. Transfer to a large mixing bowl.
Put sugar, eggs, pumpkin puree, sour cream, melted butter, and vanilla in blender. Blend until very smooth, about 30 seconds.

Add about half of dry ingredients to mixture in blender. Pulse to mix. Add remaining dry ingredients. Pulse just to mix somewhat, scraping inside of blender a few times. Do not over-blend; it's fine if dry flour remains visible.

Transfer doughnut batter to large mixing bowl. Stir in any unblended dry ingredients. Cover with plastic wrap and chill 30 minutes for dough to firm up a bit (or up to 1 hour if it still feels sticky).

Dust work surface with flour. Scoop out one-quarter of dough and pat out to 1/2 inch. Dip a 3-inch doughnut cutter in flour and cut out as many rounds as possible (or, if you don't have a doughnut cutter, use a 3-inch round cutter; then dip a 1-inch cutter in flour and cut out centers).
Carefully press scraps together and cut out more rounds and centers. Repeat with remaining dough.
Combine sugar and cinnamon in shallow bowl and set aside.

Arrange a layer of paper towels on a plate. Add oil to a large deep, wide saucepan or Dutch oven to a depth of 2 inches, leaving plenty of headroom. Attach a deep-frying thermometer to pan. Heat oil over medium-high heat until 365°F. Adjust heat to maintain temperature.
Slip a thin metal spatula under a doughnut ring and gently slide it into oil. Repeat with a few more doughnut rings, but do not crowd the pan.

Fry doughnuts until puffed and a rich brown on first side (lift with a fork or slotted spoon to check), about 2 minutes. Carefully flip doughnuts using forks or slotted spoons and fry second side until richly browned, about 2 minutes. Using forks, transfer doughnuts from oil to paper towels.
Turn warm doughnuts in cinnamon sugar to coat, then transfer to a cooling rack. Repeat to cook remaining doughnuts and doughnut holes and coat them in cinnamon-sugar.
Serve doughnuts warm or let cool completely and store in airtight container at room temperature up to 2 days. Reheat gently in a 350°F oven before serving.﻿

name: Hake Medallions With Corn Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 190 degrees Celsius.
Season the medallions with salt, pepper, and lemon.
In a food processor grind the corn bread, garlic, and cilantro to a crumble.
In a glass baking dish, place the onion slices on the bottom and the hake medallions on top. Place the ground bread mixture on top of the hake.
Drizzle with a little olive oil and bake until the fish is cooked and the cornbread is golden.
Accompany with French fries and a tomato salad.

name: Peppy Lemon-Seasoned Pork Medallions
instructions: Prepare a medium-hot fire in grill. Grate peel and squeeze juice from lemons. Stir peel into juice; set aside.
Cut each tenderloin into 6 pieces, making 1 1/2 - 1 3/4-inch-thick medallions; place in shallow dish or pie plate. Drizzle with oil and toss until pork is evenly coated.
Combine salt, garlic and pepper in small dish. Sprinkle over pork medallions in dish. Toss until evenly coated.

Grill pork medallions, cut sides down and uncovered, over direct heat for about 8 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 145 degrees F., turning medallions over halfway during grilling. Transfer medallions to a clean, shallow serving dish and allow to rest for 3 minutes. Pour lemon mixture over medallions and serve. Discard lemon juice mixture after serving.

name: Tuscan Frittata

ingredients.prep: chopped, or parsley or 1/2 tsp dried basil or parsley leaves, crushed
ingredients.name: fresh basil leaves
ingredients.fullName: 1 tablespoon fresh basil leaves (chopped, or parsley or 1/2 tsp dried basil or parsley leaves, crushed)

ingredients.prep: thinly sliced, about 3 or 4, or 1 can, 15 oz., sliced potatoes, drained
ingredients.name: small red potatoes
ingredients.fullName: 1/2 cup small red potatoes (thinly sliced, about 3 or 4, or 1 can, 15 oz., sliced potatoes, drained)

ingredients.name: Ragu® Old World Style® Pasta Sauce, heated
ingredients.fullName: 1 cup Ragu® Old World Style® Pasta Sauce, heated (heated)

instructions: In small bowl, beat eggs, basil and pepper. Stir in cheese; set aside.

In 10-inch nonstick skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat and cook onion, potatoes and mushrooms, stirring occasionally, 4 minutes or until tender. Reduce heat to low and add egg mixture. With spatula, lift set edges of frittata, tilting pan to allow uncooked mixture to flow to bottom. Cover and cook 20 minutes or until frittata is set. Invert onto serving plate and serve with Pasta Sauce.

name: Savory Breadsticks with Seeds
instructions: Preheat the oven to 190C.
Roll out the sheet of puff pastry dough.
Sprinkle the dough with a generous amount of seeds and the salt (depending on how salty you like the breadsticks).
Cut the dough into strips and twist them.
Bake the breadstick twists for approximately 15 minutes. The breadsticks should be lightly golden.

ingredients.name: loose-leaf chamomile tea
ingredients.fullName: 3 tablespoons loose-leaf chamomile tea (for 6 oz. Calvados infusion)

ingredients.prep: such as Raymond Ragnaud Pineau des Charentes, or substitute with amontillado sherry
ingredients.name: Pineau des Charentes
ingredients.fullName: 1 ounce Pineau des Charentes (such as Raymond Ragnaud Pineau des Charentes, or substitute with amontillado sherry)

name: Philly Cheesesteak Skillet

ingredients.prep: thinly sliced, or leftover sliced steak
ingredients.name: roast beef
ingredients.fullName: 1 pound roast beef (thinly sliced, or leftover sliced steak)

instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in 12-inch nonstick skillet and cook green peppers and onion, stirring occasionally, until golden, about 6 minutes. Remove pepper mixture from skillet and set aside.

Prepare Knorr® Pasta Sides™ - Stroganoff in same skillet covered, according to package directions. Top with roast beef, then cheese. Arrange pepper mixture around edge of skillet. Cover and simmer until cheese is melted, about 2 minutes.
Serve in skillet.

name: Horchata Gelatin

ingredients.prep: may substitute splenda or other sugar substitute
ingredients.name: sugar
ingredients.fullName: 2/3 cup sugar (may substitute splenda or other sugar substitute)

instructions: Pour the gelatin powder into 150 milliliters of water and allow to thicken for approximately 5 minutes.
Mix the liter of water with the evaporated milk, sugar, and vanilla in a pan and heat until tepid.
Place the gelatin mixture into the microwave for 40 seconds, until completely dissolved. Add the milk mixture and combine.
Place sliced strawberries into the bottom of a gelatin mold and pour in enough of the gelatin mixture to cover. Place in the refrigerator until completely set.
Remove from the refrigerator and pour in nearly half of the remaining gelatin mixture. Return to the refrigerator until set.

Add a few drops of red food coloring to the remaining gelatin mixture. Remove the mold from the refrigerator, make another layer of sliced strawberries, and pour half the colored gelatin mixture into the mold.
Refrigerate until set. Remove from refrigerator and pour in the rest of the gelatin mixture. Return to refrigerator until set.
Remove the gelatin from the mold by placing the mold into warm water to loosen. Turn the gelatin out onto a serving platter. Top with strawberries and serve.

name: Chipotle Enchiladas

ingredients.name: jar Old World Style® Pasta Sauce (1 lb. 8 oz.)
ingredients.fullName: 1 jar (1 lb. 8 oz.) Ragu® Old World Style® Pasta Sauce (1 lb. 8 oz.)

instructions: Preheat oven to 400°.

Heat 1 tablespoon oil in 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat and cook zucchini with onion, stirring frequently, 6 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Remove vegetables from skillet and set aside.

Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in same skillet over medium heat and cook garlic and chipotle peppers, stirring frequently, 30 seconds. Stir in Pasta Sauce and simmer covered 4 minutes. Remove from heat, then stir in sour cream.
Combine chicken, vegetables and 1 cup sauce mixture in large bowl.
Spread 1/2 cup sauce mixture in 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Arrange 6 tortillas on sauce mixture. Evenly top with chicken mixture, then remaining tortillas and sauce mixture. Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake 20 minutes or until enchiladas are heated through and cheese is melted.

name: Peppermint Marshmallows for Hot Chocolate and Marshmallows, Chocolate Covered Christmas Trees, or Decorations
instructions: Soak gelatin in cold water for 5 minutes to soften.

In a saucepan, add sugar and water, bring to a boil and cook for 5 to 10 minutes on fairly high heat until the mixture forms a syrup. It must reach 125 degrees Celsius, use a thermometer to check the temperature. Remove from heat.
In the food processor bowl, whisk the egg whites mixed with the peppermint oil until stiff.
Drain the gelatin and add it to the syrup.

Reduce the speed of the egg whites and immediately pour in the syrup while continuing to whisk. Continue whisking until the mixture cools completely, which will take 5 to 7 minutes, touch the sides of the food processor bowl to check the temperature.
Pour the mixture in an oiled pan and smooth out with a spatula, not an easy process since the marshmallow mixture is very thick. Let cool at least 2 hours.
